Name: Elderberry Syrup
Short description: We craft this small-batch syrup using fresh and dried local elderberries and elderflowers, enhanced with immune-nourishing echinacea root, adaptogenic reishi, astragalus, warming ginger, cinnamon, and clove, all balanced with Vermont honey, apple cider vinegar, and pure maple water.
Description:
Elevate your cold- & flu-season routine with our handcrafted Elderberry Syrup—a potent, delicious blend designed to support immune resilience and seasonal wellness.

We craft this small-batch syrup using fresh and dried local elderberries and elderflowers, enhanced with immune-nourishing echinacea root, adaptogenic reishi, astragalus, warming ginger, cinnamon, and clove, all balanced with Vermont honey, apple cider vinegar, and pure maple water.

  • Functional Benefits: This flavorful tonic is formulated as an immunomodulator and respiratory-supportive blend—perfect for enhancing natural defenses during seasonal transitions.

  • Versatile Use: Take it straight, stir it into tea, or drizzle it over pancakes or yogurt.

  • Quality Ingredients: All botanical components are organic and either locally grown or ethically wildcrafted for maximum potency and purity.

Suggested Use: Take one teaspoon daily as part of your wellness routine; increase to 2–3x per day during heightened seasonal stress or mild respiratory symptoms.

Safety Note: Contains honey and apple cider vinegar—please consult your healthcare provider if you are pregnant, on blood sugar–lowering medication, or have an autoimmune condition. Not intended to diagnose, treat, or replace medical advice.

Name: Motherwort Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Motherwort Tincture 2oz. Leonorus cardiaca This Motherwort tincture is made in house from freshly harvested Motherwort flowers and leaves. The fresh aerial portions are put into the food processor and then tinctured at a 1:4 strength in 70% organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water. Motherwort is ideal for those experiencing anxiety, cardiovascular palpitations, delayed menses, poor sleep, nervousness, grief, or a broken heart. It is bitter, spicy, and cooling. It is considered to be emmenagogue (stimulates menses), cardiac tonic, antispasmodic, nervine, diuretic, and carminative.  Take 1 dropperful in water or juice, up to 3 times daily. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Optimized Tryptophan Plus 90 veg caps
Short description:
Optimized Tryptophan Plus 90 veg caps 
 
 
 
Optimized Tryptophan Plus provides 1,000 mg of high-quality L-tryptophan per serving to promote a healthy mood, help support optimal sleep and support a healthy stress response. Many people prefer using tryptophan combined with its essential cofactors lysine and niacinamide in lieu of 5-HTP. Tryptophan is better able to remain stable in the blood and cross the blood-brain barrier, where it is converted to serotonin. If 5-HTP converts to serotonin in the blood, this serotonin will not cross the blood-brain barrier. Do not combine with pharmaceutical SSRI's or MAOI's. 
 
 
 
Supplement Facts 
 
Serving Size 3 vegetarian capsules 
 
Servings Per Container 30 
 
Amount Per Serving 
 
 
 
Niacin (as niacinamide) 
 
66 mg• 
 
 
 
L-Tryptophan 
 
1000 mg 
 
 
 
L-Lysine (as L-Lysine HCl) 
 
250 mg 
 
 
 
Proprietary Tryptophan Plus Blend 
 
285 mg 
 
Perluxan® Hops standardized extract (cones), Rosemary standardized extract (leaf) 
 
 
 
Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable stearate, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, silica, maltodextrin, modified food starch. 
 
•NE (niacin equivalents). 
 
Non-GMO 
 
Perluxan® is used by permission. 
 
 
 
Dosage and Use 
 
Take up to three (3) capsules all at once before bedtime, or one capsule on an empty stomach before each meal, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner. 
 
For maximum absorption take with a small amount of carbohydrate, such as diluted juice. 
 
Best if taken separately from protein or amino acids. 
 
Caution 
 
Serotonin syndrome is characterized by high levels of serotonin and symptoms like confusion, sweating, agitation, nausea, involuntary muscle contractions, and racing heartbeat. Do not take L-tryptophan if you experience these symptoms. Because tryptophan may have numerous drug interactions (most commonly, MAOIs and SSRIs) consult your healthcare provider before taking this product if you are taking prescription medications. Do not use before driving or operating heavy machinery. 
 
 
 
Warnings 
 
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN 
 
DO NOT EXCEED RECOMMENDED DOSE 
 
Do not purchase if outer seal is broken or damaged. 
 
When using nutritional supplements, please consult with your physician if you are undergoing treatment for a medical condition or if you are pregnant or lactating.

Name: Ashwagandha Powder, Organic 1oz. bag
Short description: Ashwagandha is one of the premier adaptogenic tonics. Ashwagandha powder is taken for a variety of reasons. It is one of the more nervine adaptogens, meaning that it is not overly stimulating but rather provides nourishment for the nervous system. For this reason it is ideal herb for rebuilding. Can be used to improve energy levels but also helpful with restful sleep. This plant is also considered a sexual tonic for both men and women. More and more evidence continues to show that Ashwagandha may boost serum testosterone.  Perfect to add to smoothies or beverage of your choice. Also try our Ashwagandha tincture! Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Astragalus Powder, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Astragalus is one of the chief Chinese tonic herbs for the immune system. This sweet tonic root is ideally prepared as a decoction or a tincture. It is a premier adaptogenic herb with an affinity for the lungs. It can be used to increase the number of stem cells in bone marrow and lymph tissue and encourage their development into active immune cells. Name: Cat's Claw Powder, Wildcrafted, 1oz. bag
Short description: Cat’s Claw, Wildcrafted Uncaria tomentosa Cat’s Claw is the inner bark of a vine from South America that contains a plethora of valuable chemical constituents. Cat’s Claw has the following properties: anti-inflammatory, antirheumatic, antioxidant, antiviral, antitumor, antimicrobial, contraceptive, cytostatic, and immune tonic. The indigenous people of the Amazon use it for a wide variety of applications including headaches, colds, flus, fevers, and particularly gastrointestinal uses like colitis, irritable bowel, Crohn’s and ulcers. It is thought that Cat’s Claw helps detoxify the gastrointestinal tract. Cat’s Claw is also part of the Buhner Lyme Protocol and should be considered when building a protocol for Lyme. Also consider taking our Cat's Claw tincture. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Mullein Leaf, Wildcrafted or Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Mullein is a common weed that acts as a powerful expectorant and demulcent for respiratory complaints. It soothes inflamed passageways of respiratory and urinary passageways. Helpful with dry coughs and hoarseness. V. thapsus contains a wide variety of phytoconstituents, such as flavonoids, iridoid, phenylethanoid and phenylpropanoid glycosides, saponins, as well as vitamin C and minerals. The most valuable constituents are coumarin and hesperidin, which possess healing properties. It has a mild action on the lymphatic system and can be combined with stronger lymphatic herbs. Take Mullein Leaf as a tea or consider taking our Mullein tincture. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description: Wormwood is a strong bitter herb with a great deal of history behind it. It is anthelmintic (meaning it kills parasites), antimicrobial, antiviral, antifungal, the list goes on. Energetically it is cold, bitter and acts upon the liver and gallbladder, making it an ideal herb to aid in digestion.

Name: Yellow Dock Tincture 1oz.
Short description: Yellow Dock Tincture 1oz. Rumex crispus Yellow Dock is a bittersweet root with cool energy effecting the liver and colon. It is considered a cholagogue, alterative, a blood tonic, and most notably a mild laxative. Because of its blood cleansing properties, Yellow Dock is used for chronic skin ailments such as acne, eczema, psoriasis, and other skin eruptions. It is also found in blood building formulas due to its rich iron content. We also offer Yellow Dock in bulk. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Blue Vervain Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Blue Vervain Tincture 2oz. Verbena hastata We wildcraft our Blue Vervain at the peak of it's potency and then process it fresh with organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water. Vervain is a powerful nervine, meaning that it is used to promote a state of calm. For this reason it is helpful with anxiety, insomnia caused by a busy mind, and is especially helpful for those who worry constantly! It has a bitter taste which also makes it useful for the digestive tract (the brain and gut are connected remember). These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Japanese Knotweed Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Japanese Knotweed Tincture 2oz. Reynoutria japonica Though considered an invasive scourge by some, Japanese Knotweed is an incredible medicinal herb that grows all over Vermont and beyond. Most notably, Japanese Knotweed is one of the commercial sources of the renowned "Red Wine" molecule Resveratrol. In addition to this, Japanese Knotweed finds a place in the Buhner Lyme Protocol as a neuroprotectant and more. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Jiaogulan Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Jiaogulan Tincture 2oz. Gynostemma pentaphylum Jiaogulan (Jee-ow-goo-lahn) is a lesser known adaptogen but it should be at the top of everyone's list. Although it is not a true Ginseng, it is called "Southern Ginseng" because it is an adaptogen quite similar to Ginseng. Not only that, it is a much more sustainable crop than Ginseng. Not only does it make an amazing tea, but this tincture is sweet, delicious, energizing, focusing, and enriches your vitality. We source the highest quality organic Jiaogulan from Northern Thailand and tincture at a 1:3 strength in organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water. The research on Jiaogulan is remarkable and I encourage everyone to learn more about this amazing adaptogen. Jiaogulan is a powerful adaptogenic tea from the small farming communities in Northern Thailand. It is in the Ginseng family and has a very similar sweet taste. It is stimulating and focusing without being caffeinated. “The Herb of Immortality” Try it! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Maitake Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Maitake Tincture 2oz. Grifola frondosa Also known as "Hen of the Woods" this mushroom is known as Maitake by the Japanese who considered it so valuable that they used to trade it for its weight in silver. Indeed this mushroom is valuable, as it is a choice edible as well as a powerful medicinal. Contemporary research shows Maitake to have benefits for the blood sugar, cardiovascular system, and of course the immune system. We work with Tamias Wildcrafting in Williamstown, VT to bring you this dual extracted Maitake extract. Vermont harvested Maitake is carefully dried and then decocted in reverse osmosis maple water before tincturing with organic cane alcohol. We allow the extract to macerate for at least a month before pressing and bottling. The resulting extract is a delicious and potent wild medicinal. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Mugwort Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Mugwort Tincture 2oz. Artemisia vulgaris We wildcraft this Mugwort and tincture it fresh in with organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water. Mugwort is in the family Artemisia (same family as Wormwood, Sweet Annie, and Tarragon, among others) and brings with numerous healthful properties. It is bitter, although not nearly as bitter as Wormwood, and has a familiar sweetness as well. It promotes a healthy digestive system and is also an excellent nervine. Take 1 - 2 dropperfuls in water, juice or tea. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Spilanthes Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Spilanthes Tincture 2oz. Acmella oleracea Locally grown and organic Spilanthes is tinctured fresh at peak potency in 95% organic cane alcohol. Spilanthes is also known as "toothache plant" because of the numbing effect that it has on the mouth. Take a dose and you can feel the fatty acid amide known as spilanthol causing a tingling, numbing sensation in the mouth. The plant also has a wide array of anti-microbial action, making it an ideal herb to take for cold or flu. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Tulsi 'Kapoor' Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Tulsi 'Kapoor' Tincture 2oz. Ocimum sanctum Tulsi is also known as Holy Basil or "The Incomparable One". It is a plant with sweet notes of bubblegum and spicy notes of oregano or basil. Tulsi is revered in India and considered to be adaptogenic and carminative. Many people take Tulsi for it’s broad anti-inflammatory effect but it also has significant calming and stress relieving properties. It’s delicious too! Take 1ml in a little water, juice or tea, up to 3 times per day. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Herbalism Through the Seasons - Five Element Workshop Series
Short description: We are very excited to announce the launch of a five-part series featuring Chuck Riffenburg, owner of Rogue Herbalist and Dr. Joshua Corn, Naturopathic Doctor at Stowe Natural Family Wellness. This series of workshops will take us through the seasons as we study herbalism and the human body through the lens of traditional energetics, as well as contemporary science. You may purchase the classes as a series or individually but you will receive a discount if you purchase the full series.  Spring - Liver, Gallbladder, and Detoxification Workshop April 1st, 2023 Join us as we delve into the natural processes of detoxification and learn about herbs and foods that support healthy detoxification. You will also have the opportunity to make your own herbal tea and detox juice! Summer - Cardiovascular System and Rosewater Distillation June 10th, 2023 In this class, we will explore the cardiovascular system and the herbs and foods that sustain a healthy heart. This class will coincide with our annual Rosewater Distillation workshop. Participants will take part in the rose harvest and learn about the distillation process. Everyone will take home a bottle of Rosewater! Late Summer - Digestive System and Local Plant & Mushroom Walk and Picnic September 9th, 2023 In this class, we will meet off site and go for an Herb & Mushroom Walk. We will identify various plants and mushrooms, and the class discussion will revolve around the digestive system. Please bring a backpack, hiking boots, water, and any food you may want for the picnic. You may also want to bring a pen and paper to take notes. Autumn - Respiratory and Immune System - Fire Cider Making October 21st, 2023 This class will focus on the Lungs and the Immune System, and making Fire Cider is the perfect activity to go with this theme! We will provide the various ingredients (organic apple cider vinegar, honey, ginger, garlic, peppers, etc.) that is needed to create your own Fire Cider. Winter - Kidneys & Bladder - Tea Making January 6th, 2024 The cold season is perfect for tea making, so join us as we study the Kidneys and Bladder. We will drink tea as you discover the finer points of blending an herbal tea and take home your very own creation. ***Please be aware, because of the amount of time and energy that goes into planning a series like this, there are no refunds available on a workshop purchase. Please do not purchase if you will be unable to attend the event. If you miss the event, you will not be refunded.***

Name: Pot of Gold Herbal Honey 6oz.
Short description: Ingredients: Raw Honey, Turmeric (Curcuma longa), Pipali long-pepper (Piper nigrum) Turmeric is famous as an incredibly powerful, anti-inflammatory medicinal; however, many people to not know just how protective this herb is for the liver and how supportive it is for the nervous, endocrine and immune systems. Enjoy Pot of Gold mixed into warmed milk for a ready-made golden milk; stir into hot water or just take by the spoonful, which most people do, it is that good!

Name: Breathe Easy Herbal Honey 6oz.
Short description: Raw Nevada County Honey Nettle (Urtica dioica) Chamomile (Matricaria recutita) Yerba Santa (Eriodictyon spp.), Ginger (Zingiber officinalis) Licorice (Glycyrrhiza glabra) For those who suffer from the common, uncomfortable symptoms of season allergies, a runny nose, runny eyes, headaches, fatigue and other symptoms, Breathe Easy can provide relief in those challenging  days. As one of the best natural anti-histamine botanicals, Nettle leaf is the chief herb in this formula, supported by other allies to help calm the immune response while addressing and decreasing the specific symptoms.

Name: Lemon Balm Tincture 1oz.
Short description:
Lemon Balm Tincture 1oz. 
 
 
 
The herb is considered sour, spicy, and cool. The properties of Lemon Balm are diaphoretic, calmative, antispasmodic, carminative, emmenagogue, and stomachic. It is also know for having antiviral properties, being used in topical preparations for Herpes simplex virus. It is the perfect remedy to help break a fever, an ideal children’s remedy, for stomach problems as well as calming the nerves and helping fall asleep. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Kid's Bronchial Alcohol Free 1oz.
Short description: Kid's Bronchial Alcohol Free 1oz. Kid's Bronchial is a great formula to help one resolve their respiratory congestion. This synergistic blend will make a cough more productive and help clear out the lungs, bronchial tract and sinus. When one is congested, the body is trying to clear out bacterial and viral cellular waste. We need to move the mucus out and resolve the immune activity to recreate homeostasis. This formula is similar to Respir-Ease for adults. Coughs due to colds, postnasal drip, dry and humid conditions, asthma, bronchitis, pneumonia, and sinus infection will be helped by this formula. This formula combines Lovage Root, Fresh Yerba Santa Leaf, Licorice Root, Mullein Leaf, Wild Cherry Bark, Pleurisy Root, Fresh Lobelia Herb, Vegetable Glycerin, Deionized Water, Cherry Natural Flavor. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Comfrey Root, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Comfrey Root, Organic, 1oz. bag Comfrey gets a bad name for a particular constituent known as Pyrrolizidine alkaloids (PAs), but this constituent is found in other plants as well and is really only harmful in super high doses. These alkaloids are more potent in the roots, but are also present in Comfrey Leaf. While some studies have suggested that the PAs in comfrey may be harmful, others have found that the herb is safe when used in small amounts and for short periods of time. While it is recommended that Comfrey only be used topically, this is a matter of great debate among herbalists. The dried herb can be used in poultices for sore muscles, broken bones, stiff joints, and other musculoskeletal complaints. We also have a Comfrey Liniment for topical use. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. We plant Comfrey in our herb garden around the edges of the porch and building. It is a wonderful plant in permaculture as it helps to pull up minerals from the soil and then the leaves can be used as a "green manure". They provide a beautiful ground cover as well as nourishment for the pollinators. However, be aware that certain types of Comfrey are fast spreading and could take over your garden if you let it. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Dandelion Root, Roasted, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Roasted Dandelion Root, Organic, 1oz. bag Taraxacum offinale Roasted dandelion root has a long history of being used as a coffee substitute, particularly during times of economic hardship or coffee shortages. Dandelion root has a similar appearance and texture to coffee beans and when roasted, it develops a similar flavor profile. During World War II, for example, coffee was rationed and dandelion root was often used as an alternative. The practice of using dandelion root as a coffee substitute dates back even further, with some sources claiming that it was used during the American Civil War and in the Great Depression. Dandelion root coffee is made by harvesting the roots of the dandelion plant, washing and drying them, roasting them until they are dark brown and then grounding them. The resulting powder can be used to brew a beverage that is said to have a similar taste to coffee. Some people claim that dandelion root coffee is less bitter and has a slightly sweeter taste than traditional coffee. Dandelion is high in antioxidants, minerals and inulin, a type of soluble fiber. We also offer local Dandelion Root from Foster Farm Botanicals as well as Dandelion Tincture. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Ancient Forest Tea, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Ancient Forest Tea, Organic, 1oz. bag Organic Ancient Forest is harvested from ancient tea plants in the Yunnan province of China. These Ancient Tea Plants range in age from 500 to 2,700 years old! These tea forests help support biodiversity because they are often grown in the forests to supply homes for birds and insects, which help to keep pests under control and protect against erosion. This ancient forest tea has an earthy and nuanced flavor profile, which is unlike any other black or green tea on the market. Bold, dark, and inviting; ancient forests tea is robust and earthy tea with subtly sweet notes. Contains caffeine. Aroma and Flavor With fragrant hints of rich soil and malt, the smooth taste of this tea has a heavy finish and little tannin. Brew Instructions Fill 1 teaspoon of tea in a cloth tea bag or mesh basket and place in your favorite mug. Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and allow to steep for 3-5 minutes. Experiment with steep time and quantity of tea and find your ideal cup! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Guayusa, Organic, 1oz.
Short description: Guayusa, Organic, 1oz. bag Guayusa tea is the dried leaves of a South American rainforest holly which is a close relative to yerba mate and yaupon. The indigenous cultures of Ecuador simmered guayusa leaves in water and sipped the tea for its stimulating effect, referring to it as "Night Watchman". Guayusa has a full-bodied green taste that has a slight grassy character. Shade grown guayusa leaves are nutritious and tastier compared to sun grown guayusa. This difference is obvious just by glancing at the color of the dried material. Shade grown guayusa such as ours is a bold dark green, while the sun grown leaves are much paler and are lacking in flavor. Contains caffeine. Aroma and Flavor A slight grassy aroma with a full-bodied green flavor. Brew Instructions Fill 1 teaspoon of tea in a cloth tea bag or mesh basket and place in your favorite mug. Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and allow to steep for 3-5 minutes or until desired strength is reached.

Name: Chicory Root, Raw, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description:
Chicory Root, Raw, Organic, 1oz. bag 
 
 
 
Chicory is a perennial plant that is native to Europe and parts of Asia. It has been used for centuries as a food and medicinal plant. The roots of the plant can be roasted and ground to make a coffee substitute or additive, and the leaves can be eaten raw in a salad or cooked as a leafy green. In traditional medicine, chicory has been used to treat a variety of ailments, including digestive issues, skin problems, and fever. Chicory root is rich in the fiber inulin which many people believe is what gives it anti-inflammatory properties and may be beneficial for the liver. Studies have suggested that drinking chicory root tea may improve digestion and reduce inflammation in the gut. Combines well with Roasted Dandelion Root. 
 
 
 
Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Lady's Mantle Herb, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Lady's Mantle, Organic, 1oz. bag Alchemilla vulgaris Lady's mantle (Alchemilla vulgaris) is an astringent herb that has been used to treat a variety of women's ailments, including menstrual cramps, heavy bleeding, and other women's health issues. It has astringent and anti-inflammatory properties that make it beneficial for skin health. Some studies have suggested that lady's mantle may help to reduce the symptoms of menopause and may also have a positive effect on bone health. Lady's mantle is also used in herbal medicine as a diuretic and to treat gastrointestinal issues, such as diarrhea and indigestion. Pregnant women should avoid using lady's mantle as it may cause uterine contractions. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Cacao Nibs, Roasted, Organic, 1oz.
Short description:
Cacao Nibs, Roasted, Organic, 1oz. bag 
 
 
 
In Mesoamerican cultures, particularly the Aztecs and Maya, Cacao (or cocoa) was highly valued and considered to be "the food of the gods". It was believed that the gods had created cacao and given it to the people as a gift. The word "cacao" derives from "kakawa" which means "food of the gods." Cacao was used in a variety of ways, including being consumed as a bitter beverage, used as a form of currency, and even used in religious ceremonies. The Aztecs believed that consuming cacao would bring one closer to the gods, and it was often used in religious rituals and offerings to the gods. 
 
 
 
Cacao was also believed to have medicinal properties and was used to treat a variety of ailments, including fatigue and fever. It was also believed to have aphrodisiac qualities and was used to improve overall vitality. The ancient Mesoamericans consumed Cacao as a bitter beverage, made from ground cocoa beans, mixed with water and spices, such as chili pepper, vanilla, and honey. 
 
 
 
As a medicinal herb, Cacao is a source of stimulating alkaloids such as theobromine and theophylline. This makes Cacao stimulating in a way similar to caffeinated plants. It increases energy and reduces fatigue, while supporting cognitive function. 
 
 
 
Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Dong Quai Root, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Dong Quai Root, Organic, 1oz. bag Angelica sinensis Dong Quai, or Dang Gui, is a plant native to China, Japan, and Korea. It has been used in Classical Chinese Medicine for thousands of years as a blood tonic and to regulate menses. It is an ideal blood builder for people who are anemic or have low energy. Many formulas will incorporate Dong Quai to help alleviate symptoms of menopause, such as hot flashes, and to treat PMS, infertility, and other women's ailments. It is one of the chief herbs in our Women's Daily Tonic. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Grapefruit Peel, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Grapefruit Peel Citrus x paradisi The Grapefruit is a citrus fruit of recent origin with uncertain lineage. Its fruit is a composite of sour, bitter, and sweet flavors, with a shape resembling a hybrid between an orange and a pomelo. Dried grapefruit peel provides distinct citrus notes in various applications including culinary and personal care products. Its origins can be traced back to the West Indies in the 1690s, brought by Captain Shaddock from Polynesia. Grapefruit is rich in nutrients including vitamin C, fiber, potassium, iron, and calcium. However, grapefruit can interact with certain medications, including statins, blood pressure medications, and immunosuppressants, among others. Therefore, it is recommended to consult with a healthcare professional before including grapefruit in your diet, particularly if you are taking any medications. This information has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For educational purposes only.

Name: Horseradish, Wildcrafted, 1oz. bag
Short description: Horseradish Roots, Wildcrafted, 1oz. bag Armoracia rusticana Horseradish, a member of the mustard family, is famous for its spicy and sharp flavor. It's commonly used as a condiment and served with meat dishes, stews, and roasted vegetables. With roots dating back hundreds of years, horseradish has a rich history of being utilized in traditional European herbal practices. Our horseradish powder is made from Armoracia rusticana roots and can be added to herbal vinegars, sauces, honeys, and condiments. Freshly grated horseradish is a potent source of mustard oil. The root itself has little to no scent, but when grated, the broken plant cells release enzymes that create its distinct aroma. It's best to use grated horseradish immediately or preserve it in vinegar to retain its flavor. Over time, exposure to air or heat will reduce its pungency, darken its color, and make it bitter, though its beneficial properties will still remain in dried form. This information has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For educational purposes only.

Name: Rosemary, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Rosemary, Organic, 1oz. bag Rosmarinus officinalis Rosemary is the classic spice with numerous applications for our health. Many people might know that "Rosemary is for remembrance" meaning that Rosemary supports our memory and cognitive function. It does this through various mechanisms: it has powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, but it also supports a healthy circulatory system, making it also incredibly useful for cardiovascular venous health. Old timey tonics include Rosemary Hair Oil which can be massaged into the scalp to promote growth of hair. Because of its powerful volatile oils it also has a profound carminative effect on our digestion as it relieves gas & bloating, coldness and stagnation in the GI, and helping eliminate parasites and microbes of various sorts.  Rosemary is one of the key herbs in our Inflacalm Capsules. *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Name: Sage Leaf, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Sage Leaf, Organic, 1oz. bag Salvia officinalis Sage has been used for centuries for both medicinal and culinary purposes. In traditional medicine, Sage was used as a remedy for digestive issues, as a mouthwash, and to soothe sore throat. In cooking, sage was used to season meat dishes, sauces, and stuffing. It has a slightly earthy and bitter taste that makes it a popular herb in the cuisine of the Mediterranean and Europe. Sage is also used to make a tonic that is believed to improve memory and concentration. It is a welcome addition to any meal or tea blend! We also carry Sage Essential oil. This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For educational purposes only.

Name: St. John's Wort, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: St. John's Wort Hypericum perforatum St. John's Wort is most commonly known as an herb used to combat depression and nerve pain, however traditionally it is also known as an herb for the liver. In fact, it achieves its antidepressant action via increasing various enzymes in the liver. This is important to know because it can increase the metabolism of certain pharmaceuticals and thus is contraindicated with a variety of drugs, especially SSRIs and MAOIs, but also birth control and other drugs. It is indeed a powerful nervine but is also antiviral, anti-inflammatory, astringent, antibacterial, vulnerary, sedative, hepatoprotective (liver protective), and more. If you are taking any pharmaceutical drugs, be sure to talk to your doctor before introducing St. John's Wort into your diet. If you are not taking pharmaceutical drugs then St. John's Wort is a safe and reliable herbal supplement. We also offer St. John's Wort capsules. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Short description: Wild Lettuce, Organic, 1oz. bag Lactuca virosa Wild Lettuce is also known as "Lettuce Opium" because of the latex that exudes from the cut stems and leaves. This sticky white latex is incredibly bitter (meaning it is beneficial for digestion, among other things) but it is also a good nervine. It is considered anodyne or analgesic, a good pain relieving herb. Don't worry though, this plant is incredibly safe, even for children. It can help calm a spasmodic cough and allow you to get much needed sleep. You can prepare a strong infusion of the leaves or if you are feeling more adventurous you can harvest some from the wild and collect the sticky white latex, allow it to dry and then smoke it like the old days. Name: White Willow Bark, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: White Willow Bark, Organic, 1oz. bag Salix alba White Willow Bark is commonly thought of as Nature's Aspirin or the original plant in which aspirin (salicylic acid) was found. While it is true that Willow Bark is a source of salicylic acid, the original aspirin plant was actually Meadowsweet. Regardless, White Willow Bark has secured its place as nature's aspirin and indeed it is a good natural anti-inflammatory herb. Willow Bark is a source of salicin and salicyl glycosides. It is specific for sores of the mucosa, such as ulcers, fever with intermittent chills, rheumatism, menstrual irritation and tiredness. Other uses include headache, pain, general inflammation. We also offer White Willow Bark Tincture. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

As a broad-spectrum cannabinoid extract, in addition to cannabidiol (CBD) and more than 80 other cannabinoids in hemp, Rogue Herbalist products may contain a trace amount of the cannabinoid THC, less than .3%. Much like the consumption of poppy seeds may lead to a positive drug test for opioids, the consumption of certain hemp products may lead to a positive drug test for tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). THC is inherently present in trace amounts in hemp plants. The legal limit of THC in hemp is no more than 0.3%. It is important to understand that the underlying science behind the conversion of certain cannabinoids to other related cannabinoids when consumed is not yet fully understood. If you are a person who is subject to drug testing we strongly suggest consulting your health care provider before consuming any hemp products because individual biochemistry, the potential for the conversion of cannabinoids, and the possibility of trace, but legal, amounts of THC inherent in hemp products are all factors to consider.

Name: Heal the Gut
Short description: Heal the Gut, 8.5oz. Contains: Marshmallow Root, Calendula, Plantain, Gotu Kola, Chamomile, Fennel Seed, Licorice Root, and Meadowsweet This tea blend is designed to assist in the repair of the lining of the gut. The villi and microvilli of our intestines are designed to absorb water and nutrients from the food we eat. However, due to exposure to pesticides, antibiotics, or other pharmaceutical drugs, some people have increased intestinal permeability which means tiny particles can enter the bloodstream and create an autoimmune reaction — they “leak”. This blend of healing herbs helps repair the leaks and soothed and inflamed gastrointestinal system. Please consider taking this formula alongside Triphala and L-Glutamine. Please reach out to us with more questions about our Gut Healing Protocols. All organic or wildcrafted herbs. Drink 1 – 2 cups per day. If you are taking any pharmaceutical drugs be sure to talk to your healthcare professional. This product has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Metabolism Boost
Short description: Metabolism Boost, 9oz. Contains: Jiaogulan, Grapefruit Peel, Lemon Peel, Gymnema, Ginger, Cinnamon, Hibiscus, Yerba Mate, Kola nut All Organic or Wildcrafted This formula is designed to support a health weight loss program, but it is also important to change your diet and get more exercise. The Jiaogulan and Citrus Peels promotes youthful levels and activity of the AMPK enzyme. AMPK tells your cells to stop storing fat and start burning it for energy, especially around the abdomen. In addition, the Gymnema supports healthy blood sugar levels which are interrelated with metabolism. Ginger and Cinnamon and warming circulatory stimulants that also have numerous benefits on metabolism and blood sugar. Hibiscus is a source of hydroxycitric acid which may help to suppress appetite and induce weight loss. Yerba Mate and Kola nut are sources of caffeine and other stimulating alkaloids and thus help to reduce appetite and increase energy levels through the day. Drink 1 - 2 cups in the morning. This product has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Comfrey Root Liniment 2oz.
Short description: Comfrey Root Liniment 2oz. Symphytum officinale Comfrey gets a bad name for a particular constituent known as Pyrrolizidine alkaloids (PAs), but this constituent is found in other plants as well and is really only harmful in super high doses. These alkaloids are more potent in the roots, but are also present in Comfrey Leaf. While some studies have suggested that the PAs in comfrey may be harmful, others have found that the herb is safe when used in small amounts and for short periods of time. While it is recommended that Comfrey only be used topically, this is a matter of great debate among herbalists. The dried herb can be used in poultices for sore muscles, broken bones, stiff joints, and other musculoskeletal complaints. We also carry Comfrey Root in bulk. We plant Comfrey in our herb garden around the edges of the porch and building. It is a wonderful plant in permaculture as it helps to pull up minerals from the soil and then the leaves can be used as a “green manure”. They provide a beautiful ground cover as well as nourishment for the pollinators. However, be aware that certain types of Comfrey are fast spreading and could take over your garden if you let it. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Wild Rose Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Wild Rose Tincture 2oz. Rosa canina Every summer we gather wild roses for our Rosewater Distillation Workshop. This past year we had enough rosebuds to tincture fresh, but I wanted it to be something special, so I used the water from the distillation process (basically a rose tea) with the organic cane alcohol. Not only that but we added the residual rose oil from the distillation process, along with some more dried roses and a bit of organic glycerin. Needless to say, this Wild Rose Tincture is truly phenomenal! Powerfully floral aromatic notes come together for an extract that calms the heart and mind. We also offer Rose Absolute in Jojoba oil for massage. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Despite the common myth, Valerian is in no way related to the benzodiazepine drug Valium. Valerian is incredibly safe. We also offer Valerian capsules. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Name: Propolis Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Propolis Tincture 2oz. Resina propoli Locally Collected Propolis from Vermont Beekeepers Extracted in 95% Organic Cane Alcohol Herb Strength Ratio 1 : 3 Propolis is the tree resin that bees use to coat their hives. The word literally means “for the health of the city” and indeed it does keep the beehive clean and protected from bacteria and viruses. It is a very strong antimicrobial. It can be used topically on cuts and wounds. It is indicated for bronchitis, pneumonia, and other respiratory infections. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as directed by a healthcare professional. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Heart & Vascular (Fire Element) Workshop
Short description:
Heart & Vascular (Fire Element) Workshop Join us on Saturday, June 10th from 10AM – 1PM for the second class in our Five Element Workshop Series. Heart & Vascular (Fire Element) For this class we will meet at the herb shop and then drive a short distance where we will harvest wild roses which we will bring back to the herb shop where we will proceed to distill them into rosewater. While we wait for the rosewater to distill, we will discuss:
  • Physiology of the Cardiovascular System
  • Herbs that support the heart and blood vessels
  • The connection between the heart and the nervous system
  • Medicinal foods that support the cardiovascular system
  • How to create rosewater and the benefits of roses on the heart
Please bring a basket or bucket to help gather roses. You may want to wear gloves, long sleeves, and long pants if you plan to go into the bushes! However, keep in mind it is likely the weather will be warm.

Name: Bio-Quercetin 30 capsules
Short description:
Our Bio-Quercetin supplement uses a quercetin encased in a plant-derived phytosome, which makes absorption easier. Our quercetin is up to 50 times more bioavailable than a dose of standard quercetin. 
 
 
 
Supplement Facts 
 
Serving Size 1 vegetarian capsule 
 
 
 
Amount Per Serving 
 
Bio-Quercetin phytosome 
 
 
 
29 mg 
 
 
 
10 mg quercetin [from Japanese sophora concentrate (flower bud)], phosphatidylcholine complex [from sunflower]) 
 
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), vegetable stearate, silica. 
 
 
 
Non-GMO 
 
 
 
Dosage and Use 
 
Take one (1) capsule daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
Description:
Our Bio-Quercetin supplement uses a quercetin encased in a plant-derived phytosome, which makes absorption easier. Our quercetin is up to 50 times more bioavailable than a dose of standard quercetin. 
 
 
 
Quercetin is right up there with vitamin C as one of the most powerful nutrients for immune health, and it benefits your heart, too. But like many phytonutrients, quercetin isn’t easy to absorb. So we wrapped it up in a phytosome, a plant-based, phospholipid sphere that makes this formula up to 50 times more available than conventional quercetin.

Name: St. John's Wort Tincture 2oz.
Short description: St. John's Wort Tincture 2oz. Hypericum perforatum St. John’s Wort is most commonly known as an herb used to combat depression and nerve pain, however traditionally it is also known as an herb for the liver. In fact, it achieves its antidepressant action via increasing various enzymes in the liver. This is important to know because it can increase the metabolism of certain pharmaceuticals and thus is contraindicated with a variety of drugs, especially SSRIs and MAOIs, but also birth control and other drugs. It is indeed a powerful nervine but is also antiviral, anti-inflammatory, astringent, antibacterial, vulnerary, sedative, hepatoprotective (liver protective), and more. If you are taking any pharmaceutical drugs, be sure to talk to your doctor before introducing St. John’s Wort into your diet. If you are not taking pharmaceutical drugs then St. John’s Wort is a safe and reliable herbal supplement. We also offer St. John’s Wort capsules. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Reishi Mushroom Dual Extract Powder 16:1
Short description: Reishi Mushroom Dual Extract Powder 16:1 Scientific research into the compounds responsible for Reishi mushroom activity began in the 1970’s in China and Japan. Scientists discovered highly active beta-(1-3)(1-6)-glucans with the ability to potentiate innate immunity by activating immune cells. Also discovered were secondary metabolites called triterpenoids which were present in significant amounts and sets Reishi apart from all the other medicinal mushrooms. We also offer Vermont Reishi Tincture that is very popular. Store in a cool, dry, place out of direct sunlight. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: CBD Stress Adapt capsules
Short description:
CBD Stress Adapt 
 
CBD+Herbal Blend 
 
30mg CBD per serving (900mg CBD per bottle) 
 
 
 
This potent botanical formula contains 30mg CBD (242mg broad and full spectrum hemp extract) and a proprietary blend of herbs comprised of Ashwagandha Root, Holy Basil, Cordyceps Mycelia, Schisandra Berry, and Rhodiola Root. Other ingredients: Organic sunflower lecithin, vegetable cellulose, organic MCT oil (from coconut). Take 1 capsules once per day. 
 
 
 
USA Grown Hemp, Vegan, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Contains less than 0.3% THC 
 
 
 
As a broad-spectrum cannabinoid extract, in addition to cannabidiol (CBD) and more than 80 other cannabinoids in hemp, Rogue Herbalist products may contain a trace amount of the cannabinoid THC, less than .3%. Much like the consumption of poppy seeds may lead to a positive drug test for opioids, the consumption of certain hemp products may lead to a positive drug test for tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). THC is inherently present in trace amounts in hemp plants. The legal limit of THC in hemp is no more than 0.3%. It is important to understand that the underlying science behind the conversion of certain cannabinoids to other related cannabinoids when consumed is not yet fully understood. If you are a person who is subject to drug testing we strongly suggest consulting your health care provider before consuming any hemp products because individual biochemistry, the potential for the conversion of cannabinoids, and the possibility of trace, but legal, amounts of THC inherent in hemp products are all factors to consider.

Name: Fertility-Preg 1oz.
Short description:
Fertility-Preg 1oz. 
 
Alcohol Free 
 
 
 
This alcohol free herbal blend combines Red Raspberry Leaf, Red Clover Blossoms, Nettles Leaf, and Yellow Dock Root. Fertility-Pregnancy is a tonic formula that women can use when trying to get pregnant or are already pregnant. It is also a tonic for miscarriages. These herbs are considered nutritive, i.e. they provide vitamins and minerals. Yellow Dock helps facilitate iron absorption in the small intestine to avoid or overcome pregnant anemia. Take 30 drops in juice or water, 1 - 3 times daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Warming CBD Salve 2oz.
Short description:
Warming CBD Salve – 2oz

If you’re looking for natural relief, our Warming CBD Salve is the perfect choice. Not only does it deliver powerful pain relief, but it also combines the benefits of warming and cooling sensations for a truly unique experience.

To begin with, this high-potency formula is enriched with premium CBD oil, which helps promote targeted comfort. In addition, we’ve included organic cayenne extract to stimulate circulation and add gentle heat. Moreover, camphor essential oil and menthol crystals work together to provide a refreshing cooling effect. As if that weren’t enough, peppermint and rosemary essential oils further enhance the soothing, revitalizing benefits. Finally, arnica oil is blended in for its long-standing reputation in easing muscle soreness.

All of these powerful ingredients are carefully infused into a nourishing base of organic coconut oil and pure beeswax. Therefore, the salve glides on smoothly, absorbs efficiently, and lasts longer on the skin.

In short, you’ll feel the heat, then feel the cool—making this CBD salve an essential addition to your natural wellness routine.
Description:
Warming CBD Salve – 2oz

Soothe sore muscles and ease discomfort with our Warming CBD Salve. This powerful pain-relief formula blends high-potency CBD oil with natural botanicals that deliver both a warming and cooling sensation for fast, effective comfort.

Crafted with care, each jar contains:

  • CBD Oil – promotes calm and targeted relief

  • Organic Cayenne Extract – natural warming agent to stimulate circulation

  • Camphor Essential Oil & Menthol Crystals – cooling compounds to ease aches

  • Peppermint & Rosemary Essential Oils – refreshing and revitalizing support

  • Arnica Oil – time-tested ingredient for soothing soreness

All ingredients are infused in a nourishing base of organic coconut oil and pure beeswax, creating a smooth, long-lasting balm that’s easy to apply.

Experience the heat. Feel the cool. Discover natural relief with our premium CBD salve.

Name: Stone Breaker 2oz.
Short description:
Stone Breaker 2oz. 
 
 
 
This formula blends lithotriptic plants known for their ability to assist in dissolving or destroying stone in the bladder or kidneys. This formula blends Chanca Piedra (Stone Breaker) with Hydrangea Root, Celery Seed, Fresh Marshmallow Root, and Dandelion Root. Consider adding this tincture to one of our herbal teas for added support. 
 
 
 
Take 1ml, 1- 3 times daily, or as directed by your healthcare provider. Do not take during pregnancy. Keep out of reach of children. Shake well before using.

Name: Black Cumin Seed Oil - 90 Liquid Veggie Caps
Short description:
Black Cumin Seed Oil - 90 liquid veggie caps 
 
 
 
This Black Cumin Seed oil is certified organic and is of the utmost quality. Also known as Nigella or Black Seed, this oil is a rich source of the phytochemical thymoquinone. The Qu’ran says Black Seed is the “cure for every disease except death”. While that might be a slight exaggeration, we think this Black Seed oil is pretty darn special. 
 
 
 
Take 1 - 2 caps per day or as directed by your healthcare professional. Each capsule contains 500mg organic black seed oil. Other ingredients: Vegetable cellulose, Organic carnauba wax, natural mixed tocopherols (from Sunflower Oil) 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Andrographis Capsules 90ct
Short description: Andrographis 90 Veggie Caps Andrographis is a powerful bitter that may be used to stimulate immune function and support a healthy inflammation response. The incredible bitterness of this plant means it may have a blood sugar lowering effect. It should only be used in smaller doses; large doses may cause griping (gastrointestinal pain & constipation). However, do not let this deter you as this plant has remarkable properties in combatting various bacteria, viruses, fungi, etc. Each capsules contains approximately 400mg Andrographis paniculata. In addition to this, Andrographis is part of the Stephen Buhner Lyme Protocol. Consider taking it alongside our Cat’s Claw tincture for added immune support. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Eidon Multiple Mineral 2oz.
Short description:
Eidon Multi Mineral 2oz. 
 
 
 
Eidon's multiple minerals are a complement of all essential and trace minerals necessary for good health in a silica base. In any multiple mineral formulae, the key to its successful formulation lies in its mineral balance. Minerals work in a precise balance or ratio to one another. Too much or too little of even a trace mineral can decrease the effectiveness of a formula by limiting the availability of the other minerals. For people with well-balanced mineral ratios or those looking for a basic formula to supply a well-balanced broad spectrum of the most important mineral nutrients, Eidon's multiple mineral formulae can be an excellent addition to your nutritional program. Eidon's formulation reflects the most current understanding of optimal balance in a mineral formula. The macro minerals, calcium, and magnesium are kept in a 1:1 ratio to correct the erroneous dietary trend of high calcium and low magnesium intake. Easy on the stomach. Safe for all ages no color or scent. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Fire Cider 8oz.
Short description: Ignite your seasonal shield with our Fire Cider, a bold, organic herbal elixir designed to fortify both your immune and digestive resilience. Crafted in small batches, this warming tonic blends traditional wisdom with potent botanicals to support cold & flu prevention, sinus clarity, and digestive balance.
Description:
Fire Cider 8 oz – Spicy Immune & Digestive Booster

Ignite your seasonal shield with our Fire Cider, a bold, organic herbal elixir designed to fortify both your immune and digestive resilience. Crafted in small batches, this warming tonic blends traditional wisdom with potent botanicals to support cold & flu prevention, sinus clarity, and digestive balance.

Ingredients & Benefits:
We simmer raw apple cider vinegar (with “the mother”) with garlic, onions, ginger, horseradish, hot wax peppers, habanero, cayenne, lime, turmeric, rosemary, and Vermont honey—creating a powerhouse formula rich in immunomodulators, antimicrobial compounds, and circulatory stimulants.

How to Use:

  • Start with a ½ to 1 teaspoon daily to boost your immune defenses and enhance digestive comfort.

  • Increase to 1 full tablespoon during seasonal shifts, cold & flu exposure, or when you need sinus and respiratory support.

  • Enjoy as a swift shot, mix into warm water or tea, or add a kick to sauces and dressings.

Safety & Usage Notes:
Extremely spicy—may aggravate ulcers, acid reflux, or digestive irritation. Contains honey—not for infants under 1 year. Use with caution if you’re on blood pressure or blood-thinning medications (e.g., garlic or turmeric effects). Not suitable during pregnancy without consultation. Avoid if sensitive to heat or with known gastric conditions.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Please consult your healthcare provider before use.

Name: Alaska Rhodiola Tincture 2oz.
Short description:
Alaska Rhodiola Tincture (2 oz)
Cultivated in the wilds of Alaska for peak potency, our Rhodiola rosea tincture is a powerful adaptogenic tonic crafted to enhance your energy, focus, and stress resilience.

  • Proven Benefits: Traditionally used in Siberia, Scandinavia, and Tibet, Rhodiola rosea helps the body adapt to stress, sharpen cognitive function, support endurance, and protect against mild respiratory challenges.

  • Sourced for Quality: Grown in Alaska using best agricultural practices, this tincture ensures you get wild-quality potency in every drop—supporting both local farmers and optimal herb integrity.

  • How to Use: Take 30 drops (about 1 ml) in water or juice, 1–3 times daily as needed. Ideal before demanding mental or physical activity—not recommended near bedtime due to its stimulating adaptogenic action.

Safety & Usage Notes
Rhodiola may elevate heart rate or blood pressure—use with caution if you take hypertension medications. Because of its energizing effects, avoid use before sleep. Not advised during pregnancy or for those with bipolar disorder unless under medical supervision. Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Lemon Balm Tincture 2oz
Short description: Lemon Balm Tincture 2oz. This lemon balm (Melissa officinalis) tincture is made in house from fresh aerial parts of Vermont Garden Grown Lemon Balm. The herb is considered sour, spicy, and cool. The properties of Lemon Balm are diaphoretic, calmative, antispasmodic, carminative, emmenagogue, and stomachic. It is also know for having antiviral properties, being used in topical preparations for Herpes simplex virus. It is the perfect remedy to help break a fever, an ideal children’s remedy, for stomach problems as well as calming the nerves and helping fall asleep. Name: Eidon Magnesium Liquid Concentrate 2oz
Short description: Eidon Magnesium Liquid Concentrate 2oz Magnesium plays an essential role in over 300 enzyme reactions in the human body. All refined foods are lacking Ionic Magnesium, as well as most other essential minerals. Many Americans eat a highly refined diet and are, as a result, deficient in Magnesium. Magnesium makes muscles relax. This is very important for heart function as the body needs ample stores of Ionic Magnesium to allow for proper heart muscle relaxation. Some important functions of Magnesium are: regulates calcium transport and deposition into bone, necessary for tissue growth and development, supports immune system health and function, a primary electrolyte along with Calcium, Potassium, Sodium and Chloride, helps in the conduction of nerve impulses and the relaxation of muscle tissue. Supplement Facts: Magnesium (as magnesium chloride) 80 mg (20% DV) Other ingredients: de-ionized water Suggested use: 30 drops (2 dropper squeezes) per day in water. Children under five - 15 drops. Eidon Liquid Minerals are All Natural, Highly Bioavailable and contain NO sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors, preservatives or animal by-products. Vegan and Gluten-Free. We also carry Neuro-Mag Magnesium L-Threonate capsules as well as Neuro-Mag Magnesium L-Threonate Tropical Punch Powder. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Eidon Zinc Liquid Concentrate 2 oz
Short description:
Eidon Zinc Liquid Concentrate 2 oz

Eidon's Ionic Liquid Zinc is essential for the maintenance of immune system strength and glandular health. It can be rapidly depleted when the body is fighting an illness. Zinc is the tenth most abundant element in the human body. Zinc liquid is found in all organs, tissues and cells, and is involved in the function and activation of many cellular enzymes. Enzymes are the unique cellular protein compounds that make the human body function properly.

Zinc promotes immune system health by activating the production of white blood cells. Zinc also activates the production of numerous compounds necessary for growth and development. Like enzymes, they are proteins essential to the body's health and function. These proteins are produced in specific organs in the body, passed into the bloodstream and carried to distant cells and organs to stimulate the functioning of that organ.

Zinc liquid supplement helps to support a healthy endocrine system, including the pituitary, thyroid, parathyroids, adrenals, pineal, pancreas and reproductive glands.

Excessive exposure to heavy metals (arsenic, cadmium and lead), alcohol, tobacco, pesticides, herbicides and fungicides, deplete the body’s zinc stores. Zinc deficiencies may also result from excess stress. Supplement Facts: Zinc (as zinc sulfate) 7.5 mg (50% DV). Other ingredients: De-ionized water Serving Size 30 drops (2ml) Suggested Use: 30 drops (2 dropper squeezes) per day in water. Children under five - 15 drops. Eidon Liquid Minerals are All Natural, Highly Bioavailable and contain NO sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors, preservatives or animal by-products. Vegan and Gluten-Free. We also carry Zinc Caps, 50 mg. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Eidon Potassium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz
Short description: Eidon Potassium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz Potassium is one of seven inorganic, macro mineral nutrients needed in relatively high daily amounts. It is the third most prevalent element in the body after Calcium. Along with Chloride, Sodium, Magnesium and Calcium, Potassium is an essential electrolyte. These elements are called electrolytes because they carry an electrical charge when dissolved in body fluids. Electrolytes help regulate nerve transmission and many cell membrane functions. Magnesium helps maintain the Potassium in the cells; but even more crucial is the proper Sodium to Potassium balance. Without Potassium, cell function will be impacted. Potassium works with Sodium to regulate blood pressure, transmit nerve impulses, and maintain cellular wall permeability. Along with Magnesium, it is essential for the proper functioning of the heart muscle. In this role, Potassium acts as the catalyst stimulating cellular contraction. Potassium has many functions but most important are: regulating intracellular fluids, aids in the regulation of the body's water balance, facilitating nerve impulses, transmission of electrical signals between nerves and cells, contracting muscle tissue, balancing the acid/alkaline system. Supplement Facts: Potassium (as potassium chloride) 99mg (3% DV). Other ingredients: de-ionized water. Serving Size: 30 drops (2ml) Suggested use: 30 drops (2 dropper squeezes) per day in water. Children under five - 15 drops. Eidon Liquid Minerals are All Natural, Highly Bioavailable and contain NO sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors, preservatives or animal by-products. Vegan and Gluten-Free. You may also be interested in: Potassium with Extend-Release Magnesium.  These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: Super K 90 softgels
Short description:
Super K 90 softgels Super K combines vitamin K1 with two forms of vitamin K2 in a once-daily vitamin K supplement to help support bone & heart health. Super K provides three different kinds of vitamin K. Vitamin K1, the optimal bone health and arterial health. The forms of K2 found in this supplement are MK-7 and MK-4, commonly found in some types of dairy. Vitamin K2 has been found to be up to 6 times more bioavailable than K1 and to remain active in the body for a longer period of time. A recent trial has demonstrated that nighttime leg cramps were reduced with Vitamin K2.

Supplement Facts: Vitamin C (as Ascorbyl palmitate) 10 mg Vitamin K activity 2600 mcg

From: Vitamin K1 (as phytonadione) 1500 mcg Vitamin K2 (as menaquinone-4) 1000 mcg Vitamin K2 (as trans menaquione-7) 100 mcg

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
Description:
Super K – 90 Softgels
Your once-daily solution for optimal vitamin K support—promoting strong bones, healthy arteries, and balanced calcium metabolism.

Product Highlights:

  • Triple-form vitamin K blend: Provides K1 and both bioactive K2 forms (MK-4 & MK-7) for superior absorption and extended support.

  • Supports bone density & arterial health: Vitamin K facilitates calcium integration into bones while keeping calcium from depositing in arteries—helping maintain robust skeletal structure and healthy circulation.

  • Convenient daily dosing: One softgel per day delivers 1500 mcg K1, 1000 mcg K2 (MK-4), and 100 mcg K2 (MK-7), making it easy to meet your daily vitamin K needs.

  • High-quality formulation: Gluten-free, non-GMO, and carefully crafted for purity and potency.

Suggested Use:
Take one (1) softgel daily with a meal or as recommended by your healthcare professional.

Important Safety Information:
If you are taking anticoagulant medications (e.g., warfarin), consult your healthcare provider before use. Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. If pregnant or nursing, talk to your physician before taking this or any supplement.

Name: Tea Infuser - Mesh Ball
Short description: Mesh Tea Ball, 2.5" Diameter Enjoy the perfect cup of tea with this stainless steel mesh tea ball - an easy way to brew an individual cup of tea or small pot from loose tea leaves. Features a chain with hook and a strong-locking clasp - perfect for tea leaves, and also great for herbs and spices.  You can use the hook to hang it onto the edge of your cup. See our selection of loose leaf bulk herbs, as well as our made-in-house tea blends, such as our Calming Nervine Formula. You may also be interested in our Tea - Infuser with with spring action handles, or our Tea Infuser - Over the Cup Basket Style.

Name: Tea Infuser with Spring Action Handle
Short description: Mesh Tea Ball with Spring Action Handle. 2.25" D Mesh Ball. Enjoy the perfect cup of tea with this stainless steel mesh tea ball with spring action handle - an easy way to brew an individual cup of tea or small pot from loose tea leaves. Works with most loose leaf tea leaves, and is also great for herbs and spices. The long spring action handle provides easy retrieval- just squeeze the handle and the infuser slides open. Long, stainless steel neck accommodates most cups and mugs. You may also be interested in our Tea Infuser - Mesh Ball. A tea infuser would make a great gift, along with an herbal tea blend such as our Snooze Blend, as well as a jar of herbal honey such as the Sleepezz Herbal Honey.

Name: Tea Infuser - Basket Style
Short description: Tea Infuser - Basket Style. This tea infuser fits right over the top of your favorite tea mug or jar and is the perfect way to brew loose leaf tea. It is stainless steel and does not alter the taste of the tea. The fine mesh infuser is large enough for the leaves to fully open and the water to flow freely though them, essential in order to take full advantage of high quality teas. Suitable for cups and glasses between 6.5 and 10 cm in diameter. Practical and easy to clean. This basket infuser even comes with a lid to keep the volatile oils from evaporating while your tea brews - keep all the medicine down in your cup of tea! You may also be interested in our Tea Infuser – Mesh Ball, or our Tea Infuser with Spring Action Handle. A tea infuser would make a great gift, along with an herbal tea blend such as our Snooze Blend, as well as a jar of herbal honey such as the Sleepezz Herbal Honey.

Name: Astragalus Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Astragalus Tincture 2oz. Astragalus (Astragalus membranaceous) is one of the premier immune tonics from Traditional Chinese Medicine. It is better to take this herb as a builder when you are well and not during the acute phase of infection. Also consider Astragalus root in bulk. This Astragalus Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site, and is made from Organically Grown Dried Roots. Dual Extracted in 40-50% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:2.5 These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Ginger Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Ginger Tincture 2oz. Ginger (Zingiber officinale) is one of the most important herbs in the entire materia medica. This warming, spicy, pungent root has a pronounced effect on the circulatory system as well as digestion. Many people think only of ginger to help settle the stomach (which it does amazingly) but it is also one of the best herbs to help support a healthy inflammatory response. Also the perfect herb to add to formulas as it helps move the formula and aid in absorption. Take 30 drops in juice or water, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. If it is too spicy then take with a meal. This Ginger Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from Organically Grown Dried Roots. Extracted in 60% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:1.7. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. You may also be interested in CBD InflaSoother Capsules which contain ginger. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Goldenrod Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Goldenrod Tincture 2oz. Goldenrod (Solidago canadensis) is knows for its wonderfully aromatic properties and is also drying, carminative, diuretic, astringent, and anti-inflammatory. Some of the traditional uses include seasonal allergies, bladder support, and diarrhea. This Goldenrod Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from Locally Wildcrafted Fresh Aerial Parts. Extracted in 55% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:2. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. You may also be interested in our Stinging Nettle Tincture, which has a few overlapping properties and uses including seasonal allergy and respiratory support. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Horseradish Tincture 2oz
Short description: Horseradish Tincture 2oz. Horseradish, (Armoracia rusticana) a member of the mustard family, is famous for its spicy and sharp flavor. It’s commonly used as a condiment and served with meat dishes, stews, and roasted vegetables. With roots dating back hundreds of years, horseradish has a rich history of being utilized in traditional European herbal practices. Some of its useful properties include supporting the respiratory system, digestion, reducing inflammation as well as antimicrobial and antibacterial support. It's also a common ingredient in Fire Cider. This information has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For educational purposes only. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Wormwood Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Wormwood Tincture 2oz. Wormwood (Artemisia absinthium) is a strong bitter herb with a great deal of history behind it. It is anthelmintic (meaning it kills parasites), antimicrobial, antiviral, antifungal, the list goes on. Energetically it is cold, bitter and acts upon the liver and gallbladder, making it an ideal herb to aid in digestion. This Wormwood Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from Vermont Garden Grown Fresh Aerial Portions. Extracted in 95% Organic Cane Alcohol. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:5. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
