Name: Teasel Tincture 4oz
Short description: Teasel Tincture 4oz Dipsacus fullonum Teasel Root has antibacterial, antiviral, detoxifying, and immune boosting properties.  It has been traditionally used to support a healthy musculoskeletal system (muscles, bones, ligaments, and tendons). It is bitter, aromatic, slightly sweet, clearing, and stimulating. The teasel root offered by Mountain Rose Herbs is responsibly gathered by local wildcrafters. Teasel is easily recognized by its prickly leaves and stem, along with its pinkish or purplish flowers that form on a large head.  According to the herbalist Brigitte Mars, “the common name teasel derives from the Old English word “tcesan”, meaning “to tease”, in reference to the use of the tops in carding wool. Our Mountain Rose Herbs teasel tincture is made with fresh teasel roots and organic alcohol at their extract facility. Teasel extract can be blended with Solomon’s seal extract, or turmeric extract, among others. It can be taken in water or juice or added to teas such as turmeric ginger tea. Ingredients Organic alcohol, water, and fresh teasel root. Supplement Facts: Serving size 1mL. Servings per container: 120. Amount per serving: Teasel (root): 0.25g Other Ingredients: Organic Alcohol (50-60%) and water. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Mango Seed Butter, 4oz
Short description: Mango Seed Butter, Refined, 4oz Mangifera indica Mango Seed Butter is pressed from the seed kernel of the mango tree, and this highly prized butter is an exceptional quality base ingredient for body care products and soap making recipes. Mango butter has a composition resembling shea and cocoa, with a slightly different fatty acid content. Mango butter smells slightly sweet and fatty in its natural form, and the refined butter that we offer smells very mild lending itself well to incorporation within cosmetic and body care creations. It generally has a rich creamy color and is hard at room temperature. Mango butter has natural emollient properties; it has traditionally been used in the rain forest and tropics for its moisturizing and smoothing properties. It is a great source of essential fatty acids, and has beneficial moisturizing properties for lotions and acts as a mild lubricant for the skin. To prolong its shelf life, store in a dark, cool location. Mango is a relatively hard butter and does not apply well as a “stand alone” application; however it will disperse evenly onto the skin once liquefied and warmed. It is best used within cosmetic formulations or added with other ingredients to make it more pliable. We package our Refined Mango Seed Butter into 4 oz glass jars for your use. You may also be interested in Jojoba Seed Oil.  These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Shea Butter Organic Unrefined 4oz
Short description: Shea Butter Organic Unrefined 4oz Vitellaria paradoxa This organic unrefined shea butter is crafted from shea nuts grown in Ghana. Shea butter is popular in the natural body care and cosmetic industry and has been used for centuries in Africa for its moisturizing properties. Shea butter contains vitamins A and E as well as essential fatty acids and other vitamins and minerals. Shea butter is an intense moisturizer for rough skin. Due to its emollient properties, it is a perfect ingredient to include in your body care recipes and skin care regime. It is also wonderful to use in the summer as a moisturizer before and after sun exposure. Because of its unrefined state, the scent of this butter is quite odoriferous and may alter your product’s aroma. The aroma of our Shea butter is often described as thick and nutty. There are often slight differences in the color from batch to batch likely due to natural variance. To prolong its shelf life, store in a cool, dark location. We package this Organic Unrefined Shea Butter into 4 oz glass jars for your use. You may also be interested in Mango Seed Butter or our local Vermont Beeswax. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Motherwort herb, Vermont Grown Organic, 1 oz bag
Short description: Motherwort herb Leonorus cardiaca Organically grown by Foster Farm Botanicals in East Calais, Vermont. Motherwort is ideal for those experiencing anxiety, cardiovascular palpitations, delayed menses, poor sleep, nervousness, grief, or a broken heart. It is bitter, spicy, and cooling. It is considered to be emmenagogue (stimulates menses), cardiac tonic, antispasmodic, nervine, diuretic, and carminative. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. We also make a Motherwort tincture. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Eidon Mineral Enriched Moisturizing Lotion 16oz
Short description: Eidon Mineral Enriched Moisturizing Lotion Eidon has pioneered a Silica, Sulfur (MSM), Magnesium, Zinc and Copper enhanced moisturizing lotion utilizing Silica's important role in maintaining the body's connective tissue - including skin, hair and nails. This unique blend of herbal and botanical oils, combined with the absorbent and therapeutic qualities of Eidon’s Ionic Minerals, penetrates quickly without greasiness. Silica's water bonding qualities attract and hold moisture to the skin. MSM is known as the "beauty mineral" because it keeps the complexion clear and youthful. Magnesium, Zinc and Copper have been added to help calm, soothe and rejuvenate the skin. This lotion softens and adds elasticity to dry and/or aging skin. Use as a moisturizer, foundation base, shaving cream, or hair conditioner. Eidon's Mineral Enriched Moisturizing Lotion is free from colorings, perfumes, sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), sodium laureth sulfate (SLES), parabens, lanolin, phthalates, alcohol, soap and formaldehyde. Ingredients: Purified Water, Polawax (plant derived), Stearic Acid, Grapefruit Seed Extract, Glycerin, Sunflower Oil, Silica-Sulfur-Magnesium-Zinc-Copper Blend, Hops Extract, Chamomile Extract, Comfrey Extract, Peruvian Salt, Argan Oil, Avocado Oil, Jojoba Oil, Hemp Oil, Grape Seed Extract, Orange and Tangerine Essential Oils, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E. For external use only. Vegan and Gluten Free. Produced with no animal by-products and without animal testing. Thoroughly tested on humans! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Resveratrol Elite 60 Capsules
Short description:
Resveratrol Elite 60 capsules Resveratrol is an anti-aging supplement that’s good for your heart, mind, and cellular health. But traditional resveratrol has low bioavailability. This formula contains trans-resveratrol in a hydrogel coating to improve bioavailability up to a whopping 10x! That is combined with a high-bioavailability form of quercetin—a phytonutrient that’s good for your heart and immune system. This advanced formula allows your body to make the most of these super-nutrients' health benefits. Found in red grapes, as well as Japanese knotweed, resveratrol is a plant compound that promotes healthy aging and overall health. Quercetin is a bioflavonoid nutrient that supports cardiovascular health and encourages a healthy immune response.
Supplement Facts
Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule
Amount Per Serving
Resveratrol Elite™ 222 mg
Proprietary Blend Providing 18% trans-resveratrol (40 mg) [from Japanese knotweed (root)], 35% galactomannans (77 mg) [from fenugreek (seed)]
Bio-Quercetin® Proprietary Blend 9 mg
Providing 35% quercetin (3 mg) [from Japanese sophora concentrate (flower bud), 30% galactomannans (2.7 mg) [from fenugreek (seed)]
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), sunflower lecithin, sunflower oil, silica, vegetable stearate, calcium High Bioavailability silicate.
Dosage and Use
Take one (1) capsule daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN When using nutritional supplements, please consult with your physician if you are undergoing treatment for a medical condition or if you are pregnant or lactating.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: L-Lysine 620mg 100 Capsules
Short description:
L-Lysine 620mg 100 Capsules
Lysine, a building block for protein, is an essential amino acid, which means it is not produced by our bodies. Therefore, it has to be obtained through our diet. Lysine helps encourage a healthy stress response and helps inhibit glycation, which can play a role in a variety of age-related factors. Among its potential health benefits, lysine supplementation has been shown to increase calcium absorption and retention. L-Lysine Benefits: Supports healthy nitrogen balance, Promotes healthy calcium metabolism, Encourages a healthy stress response, Helps inhibit glycation. Supplement Facts: Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule Amount Per Serving: L-Lysine (as L-Lysine HCl) 620 mg Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), vegetable stearate, L-leucine. Dosage and Use: Take one (1) capsule one to three times daily on an empty stomach, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Citicoline (CDP-Choline) 60 Capsules
Short description:
Citicoline (CDP-Choline) 60 Capsules 
 
 
 
Choline is needed by our brains to produce acetylcholine, a neurotransmitter that facilitates communication between neurons. Unfortunately, our brain cells absorb less choline as we age—which makes choline supplementation a good idea. Our Citicoline (CDP-Choline) provides a form of choline that readily passes through the blood-brain barrier (BBB) directly into the brain, where cells can easily use it to nourish cellular membranes and support neurotransmitter production. Choline helps use produce a neurotransmitter that facilitates communication between neurons - a basic part of healthy brain function. Citicoline (CDP-Choline) Benefits: encourages the synthesis of neurotransmitters in the brain, supports healthy cognition & attention, and supports overall memory function & mood. 
 
 
 
Supplement Facts: 
 
Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule 
 
Amount Per Serving: 
 
Citicoline (as citicoline monosodium salt) 250mg 
 
Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), microcrystalline cellulose, silica, vegetable stearate. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: D, L-Phenylalanine 500mg 100 Capsules
Short description: D, L-Phenylalanine 500mg 100 capsules Phenylalanine is an essential amino acid, which means your body can’t produce sufficient amounts and requires it from an external source. It’s converted to L-tyrosine in the liver, which is then converted into dopamine, norepinephrine and epinephrine (adrenaline) hormones that can become depleted for a variety of reasons. Replenishing norepinephrine in the brain can support brain health. The neurotransmitters produced from phenylalanine supplementation bring a wide range of cognitive health benefits. D, L-Phenylalanine Benefits: supports production of L-tyrosine, which is used to make dopamine, norepinephrine & epinephrine, helps promote healthy mood & sleep, supports healthy cognitive function, and provides protection for brain cells. Supplement Facts: Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule Amount Per Serving: D,L-phenylalanine 500 mg Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), vegetable stearate, microcrystalline cellulose. Dosage and Use: Take one (1) capsule daily on an empty stomach in the morning, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner. Best utilized if taken with the co-factors vitamins B6 and C. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Short description: Cilantro Heavy Metal Detox™ With Chlorella 2oz Cilantro Heavy Metal Detox™ is designed to bind to heavy metals to clear them from the body. The combination of cilantro and chlorella elicits a potent cleansing action and provides antioxidant support for overall cellular health. Name: Triple Action Cruciferous Vegetable Extract 60 Capsules
Short description:
Triple Action Cruciferous Vegetable Extract, 60 vegetarian capsules
Our Triple Action Cruciferous Vegetable Extract combines plant extracts derived from leafy green “cruciferous” vegetables. This comprehensive, food-based formula promotes cellular health and already healthy hormone levels. Maintaining healthy hormone levels is essential to any comprehensive whole-body health strategy. This supplement combines extracts of broccoli, cabbage and other phytonutrients to help maintain already healthy hormone levels. Compounds in cruciferous vegetables help maintain already healthy hormone levels and promote DNA health. Triple Action Cruciferous Vegetable Extract Benefits: Offers advanced cellular protection, Promotes healthy DNA, Helps maintain already healthy hormone levels, Promotes liver health & healthy estrogen metabolism via I3C (indole-3-carbinol) and DIM (diindolylmethane) compounds.

Supplement Facts: Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule Amount Per Serving: Broccoli super concentrate extract (seed and plant) [providing glucosinolates] 400 mg I3C (indole-3-carbinol) 80mg Watercress 4:1 extract (whole herb) 50mg Rosemary extract (leaf) [std. to 20% diterpenic compounds, providing carnosic acid/carnosol] 50mg Cat's claw extract (bark) 50mg Apigenin 25mg Cabbage extract (leaf) 25mg DIM (3,3’-diindolylmethane) 14mg Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, vegetable stearate, silica.

NON GMO Dosage and Use: Take one (1) capsule daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Kudzu Recovery Anti-Alcohol and Liver Support 750mg 60tablets
Short description: Kudzu Recovery Anti-Alcohol and Liver Support 750mg 60tablets Kudzu (Pueraria lobata) The roots of Kudzu have been used in traditional Chinese herbalism for reducing the negative effects of alcohol. Historically, it was used in formulas used for “drunkenness”. More recently, kudzu root received a lot of mainstream attention due to a Harvard University study on the plant's ability to help decrease consumption of alcohol in human subjects. The study published in Alcoholism: Clinical and Experimental Research, underscores what Chinese herbalism has long known, that kudzu is the premier herb for managing alcohol intake! Kudzu Recovery™ contains a centuries old Chinese formula offering all the benefits of kudzu plus key botanicals to support liver cleansing, balanced blood sugar levels and enhanced energy. Based on a 350-year old Chinese herbal formula for “drunkenness”, Kudzu Recovery provides a blend of kudzu roots in conjunction with key botanicals including coptis, codonopsis, and ginger, which support liver health, the nervous system, and detoxification processes. This gives the benefits of kudzu while supporting other systems necessary for the healthful management of alcohol intake. Supplement Facts for 750 mg Tablet: Serving Size: 2 Tablets Calcium (as dibasic calcium phosphate) (31mg) Proprietary Blend: Kudzu Root Extract, Japanese Raisin Tree Fruit, Coptis Root, Poria sclerotium, Zhu Ling sclerotium, Ginger Root, Bai-Zhu Atractylodes Rhizome, Codonopsis Root, Shen Qu-Massa Fermentata Extract, and Fennel Seed. (1.5g) Other Ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, sorbitol, stearic acid, dibasic calcium phosphate, silica, modified cellulose gum, and magnesium stearate. Description: Kudzu Recovery Anti-Alcohol and Liver Support 750mg 60tablets Kudzu (Pueraria lobata) The roots of Kudzu have been used in traditional Chinese herbalism for reducing the negative effects of alcohol. Historically, it was used in formulas used for “drunkenness”. More recently, kudzu root received a lot of mainstream attention due to a Harvard University study on the plant's ability to help decrease consumption of alcohol in human subjects. The study published in Alcoholism: Clinical and Experimental Research, underscores what Chinese herbalism has long known, that kudzu is the premier herb for managing alcohol intake! Kudzu Recovery™ contains a centuries old Chinese formula offering all the benefits of kudzu plus key botanicals to support liver cleansing, balanced blood sugar levels and enhanced energy. Based on a 350-year old Chinese herbal formula for “drunkenness”, Kudzu Recovery provides a blend of kudzu roots in conjunction with key botanicals including coptis, codonopsis, and ginger, which support liver health, the nervous system, and detoxification processes. This gives the benefits of kudzu while supporting other systems necessary for the healthful management of alcohol intake. Name: Beet Essence Juice Powder 5.3oz
Short description: Organic Beet Essence Juice Powder 5.3oz Organic Beet Essence Juice Powder May Help: • Fight Off Free Radicals: Beets are a fantastic source of antioxidants, in particular vitamin C, manganese and two carotenoids called lutein and zeaxanthin. • Reduce Inflammation: Pigments in beets may help reduce inflammation, consequently reducing risk factors for developing everything from heart diseases to cancer. The same pigments may also reduce pain associated with osteoarthritis. • Protect Vision: Studies have found a link between consuming lutein and zeaxanthin and lowering risk factors for age-related macular degeneration, and it may also help prevent cataracts and retinitis pigmentosa. • Lower Blood Pressure: Beets can help lower blood pressure, likely due to the high level of nitrates naturally present in the vegetable. • Improve Energy Levels and Physical Performance: Consuming beet juice on a daily basis may help athletes increase their oxygen use, improve performance and boost endurance. • Prevent Cognitive Decline: Nitrates once again come into play here by increasing the dilation of blood vessels and promoting blood flow to the brain, especially the frontal lobe, which controls memory and decision-making. • Cleanse the Liver: Beets contain an amino acid called betaine that may assist in reducing the amount of fat that accumulates in the liver, improving function and helping the liver stay a healthy size. • Support Detoxification: As toxins build up, our bodies have to work overtime to clear the debris and accomplish routine tasks Green Foods Beet Essence is most effective when taken on an empty stomach, preferably either 20 minutes before or 2 hours after a meal. Simply stir a single serving (5 grams, or about one teaspoon) of the powder into 6-8 ounces of your favorite cold liquid. Beet Essence is delicious when mixed with water, or you can add it to your favorite fresh juice or smoothie. Use Beet Essence as a daily complement to your plant-based or omnivore diet, or treat yourself to a healthy boost on those afternoons when you feel your energy flagging. Our Beet Essence only has two ingredients: organic beet juice powder and organic maltodextrin (derived from tapioca). The powder contains no added salt, sugar, coloring, fillers, animal products, soy, wheat, gluten, corn, yeast or GMOs. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Best taken on an empty stomach, it's a simple addition to drinks for daily use or an energy boost. Contains only organic beet juice powder and maltodextrin, free from additives or allergens. Name: Magnesium Carbonate Powder Raspberry Lemon Flavor 16oz
Short description:
CALM Magnesium Carbonate Powder Raspberry Lemon Flavor 16oz from Natural Vitality We LOVE magnesium for the mood benefits. But the fact is, magnesium is essential for over 300 processes in the body, yet most of us don’t get enough of it. So even if you’re sipping for serenity, know that you’re doing so much more for your well-being. BALANCED MOOD Our favorite benefit of magnesium, of course, is how well it works to support a balanced mood and healthy response to stress. It also eases tension and helps you relax. NIGHTTIME RELAXATION Magnesium helps ease tension so you can relax for a good night’s sleep. MUSCLE FUNCTION When we say magnesium is an essential mineral, we mean it. Your muscles need it in order to contract and relax. The means the more active you are, the more you need it to help support healthy muscle function.* BRAIN & NERVOUS SYSTEM FUNCTION Magnesium protects the lining of your nerves and helps your nerves talk to each other. Ultimately, this supports healthy overall nerve and brain function. CARDIOVASCULAR HEALTH Another reason to love magnesium? Your heart. Not only does it help maintain healthy blood pressure levels, but it’s also required for normal heart contraction. BONE DENSITY Keeping up your daily levels of magnesium helps you maintain healthy bones. When you don’t get enough, your body’s ability to absorb calcium and vitamin D might be impacted. Helps ease tension with 325 mg magnesium citrate Supplement Facts: Serving Size 2 teaspoons Amount Per Serving: Magnesium carbonate (325 mg) Other ingredients: citric acid, organic lemon flavor, organic raspberry flavor with other natural flavors, organic stevia (leaf) extract. Magnesium carbonate and citric acid, when combined with water, create a solution of magnesium citrate.
  • Contains no sugar, fructose, artificial color or flavor.
  • Gluten-Free
  • Non-GMO Project Verified
  • Vegan
  • Certified C.L.E.A.N.
How to take
Take daily. Anytime you’re ready to relax, mix up a cup of CALM and enjoy with or without food. Step 1: Start with half a teaspoon (1g) daily and gradually increase to two leveled teaspoons (4g) per day as needed. Place powder in a glass or mug, add 2-3 oz. of hot or cold water. Step 2: Let it fizz, then stir until dissolved and clear. Step 3: Fill the rest of the cup with warm or cold water, and sip!   These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: SinuOrega Nasal Mist (2oz)
Short description:
SinuOrega Nasal Mist (2oz) is a natural nasal wash powered by potent spice extracts.  These powerful extracts are combined with pure sea salt in a spring water base, the ideal wash and inhalant for the nasal membranes and sinuses. Can be used daily as it is non-addictive. Always free from:  alcohols, polysorbate 80, and sodium chloride. Sinusitis is highly prevalent in the American population and has been found to affect up to 37 million people, which is nearly one of seven Americans.  SinuOrega is a natural nasal wash powered by potent spice extracts.  These powerful extracts are combined with pure sea salt in a spring water base, the ideal wash and inhalant for the nasal membranes and sinuses. How to Use: Insert nozzle next to inner nasal membrane and gently squirt. Sniff contents deeply. Repeat with each nostril as needed. Temporary burning, stinging, sneezing and nasal discharge may occur.
Ingredients: Filtered/purified water, Wild oil of oregano, Sea salt, Clove bud oil, Oil of sage, and Oil of bay leaf
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Nasal Cleansing Pot - Ceramic
Short description:
Nasal Cleansing Pot - Ceramic For the cleansing and moisturizing of nasal passages according to the traditional practices of Neti. Benefits: Clear the nasal passages, remove excess mucus, reduce dust and pollen by cleansing nasal passages, and relieve nasal dryness. Ancient Secrets Nasal Cleansing Pot is the ideal answer for cleansing and moisturizing of nasal passages. You need only follow the simple directions inside to prepare the saline solution used to rinse through your nostrils. This gentle and effective technique of nasal irrigation is widely recommended by practitioners of yoga and ayurveda world-wide as a wonderful way to improve your overall feeling of well-being. (Complete instructions inside package)::1. Prepare the saline solution and fill pot. 2. Tilt your head to the side as shown. 3. Insert spout of nasal cleansing pot gently into the raised nostril creating a seal between Pot and nostril. 4. Raise the nasal cleansing pot slowly to develop a steady flow of saline solution through the upper nostril and out the lower nostril. 5. During the process breathe through your mouth. 6. Upon completion, exhale firmly several times to clear the nasal passages. 7. Reverse the tilt of your head and repeat the process on the other side.
Weight 0.64Lb
Content Description for the cleansing of nasal passages according to the traditional practice of Neti
Original Ceramic Model crafted from sturdy lead-free ceramic and coated with food-grade sealant glaze. Heavy-duty construction-dishwasher safe. Brand: Ancient Secrets. Name: Baikal Skullcap Root, Organic,1 oz bag
Short description: Baikal Skullcap Root, Organic,1 oz bag of cut and sifted root Baikal skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) is native to North China, Russia, Mongolia, Japan and Siberia and is sometimes referred to as Chinese Skullcap, being a well known Traditional Chinese herb used as a strengthening immune and nerve tonic. The root is anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, antiviral, antioxidant, and a nervine. (Not to be confused with the North American skullcap, Scutellaria laterifolia, in which the leaf and aerial parts are used). Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Perfect for preparing for sleep. It's a little like watching sheep count you. 
 
 
 
As a broad-spectrum cannabinoid extract, in addition to cannabidiol (CBD) and more than 80 other cannabinoids in hemp, Rogue Herbalist products may contain a trace amount of the cannabinoid THC, less than .3%. Much like the consumption of poppy seeds may lead to a positive drug test for opioids, the consumption of certain hemp products may lead to a positive drug test for tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). THC is inherently present in trace amounts in hemp plants. The legal limit of THC in hemp is no more than 0.3%. It is important to understand that the underlying science behind the conversion of certain cannabinoids to other related cannabinoids when consumed is not yet fully understood. If you are a person who is subject to drug testing we strongly suggest consulting your health care provider before consuming any hemp products because individual biochemistry, the potential for the conversion of cannabinoids, and the possibility of trace, but legal, amounts of THC inherent in hemp products are all factors to consider. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Manuka Honey - Medical Grade MGO 400
Short description:
Medical Grade Manuka is honey with superpowers! Due to its oligosaccharides, the prebiotic activity supports a healthy gut microbiome. Oligosaccharides are carbohydrates that cannot be digested by the human body. Instead, they go right to the large intestine where they act as a prebiotic - food for your good gut bacteria - which offer a wide range of health benefits, including improved microbiome health and a stronger immune system.<sup> </sup> 
 
 
 
The gut microbiome is considered healthy when good bacteria outnumber bad bacteria. The acidic environment of the stomach performs an invaluable job in killing many of the bad bacteria before them making it to the intestines where they can affect the bacterial balance. If you have too many harmful gut bacteria, the body may struggle to fight off infection. A large portion of the immune system resides in the gut microbiome, supporting the good bacteria with prebiotic nourishment is an essential part of the body’s ability to mount a strong defense.

Source Naturals Magnesium Glycinate 120 Tablets 
 
 
 
Magnesium is one of the most important minerals in the body, but an estimated 75% of Americans are magnesium deficient. Name: Baikal Skullcap Tincture 2oz
Short description: Baikal Skullcap 2oz Tincture Baikal skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) is native to North China, Russia, Mongolia, Japan and Siberia and is sometimes referred to as Chinese Skullcap, being a well known Traditional Chinese herb used as a strengthening immune and nerve tonic. The root is anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, antiviral, antioxidant, and a nervine. (Not to be confused with the North American skullcap, Scutellaria laterifolia, in which the leaf and aerial parts are used). This Baikal Skullcap Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from USDA Organic Dried Roots. Extracted in 70% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:2.5. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. You may also be interested in our Baikal Skullcap cut and sifted dried roots in bulk. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Bentonite Clay Powder, 1oz bag
Short description: Bentonite clay powder is a naturally occurring by product of volcanic ash exposed to wind and water. It is added to natural body powders, usually in combination with corn starch or orris root powder. Moistened with a small amount of water, bentonite clay makes an excellent facial mask to draw out impurities from the skin. Some also put on top of tick bites or other bug bites to draw out the poison and itch. It would make a great addition to a tick kit. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Name: Bitter Orange Peel, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description: Bitter Orange Peel, Organic, 1oz bag Bitter Orange (Citrus x aurantium) is an evergreen tree with long spines, aromatic flowers, and orange fruits whose membranes are sour and bitter. Bitter orange is used as a flavoring agent in many foods and beverages, including marinades, jams, and liqueurs. Our organic bitter orange peel can also be infused to make soaps, body scrubs, and skin care products. It is also used as a flavoring agent in many foods, and for its fragrance in bath and body care products.  As a flavoring agent it can be used in a wide variety of foods and is used in liqueurs (most notably Triple Sec), desserts, candies, gelatins and puddings. It is used to cover up the taste of pharmaceuticals, as well as being a key ingredient in marmalade. The peel is used in teas, adding a citrusy aroma and reddish-brown color splash.  Precautions May affect the metabolism of certain drugs. If taking medications consult under the supervision of a qualified healthcare practitioner before use. We recommend that you consult with a qualified healthcare practitioner before using herbal products, particularly if you are pregnant, nursing, or on any medications. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. We also carry Grapefruit Peel. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Black Walnut Hulls, Organic,1oz. bag
Short description: Black Walnut Hulls, Organic, 1oz bag Juglans nigra The tree is Black Walnut (Juglans nigra), but before the Walnuts are ripe they are green. This is the stage of harvest while the medicinal constituents are at their highest. The black walnut is covered with a green pulp until autumn, when it falls to the ground and turns black. Black Walnut Hull is the shell, or coating of the nut inside. Black Walnut is a classic anthelmintic herb, killing parasites, bacteria, fungus, and more. It has an affinity for the thyroid and is helpful with constipation. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. We also sell Black Walnut Tincture. Name: Blessed Thistle, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Blessed Thistle, Organic, 1oz. bag. Cnicus benedictus Bitter in flavor, blessed thistle is commonly used in extracts and cordials. Blessed thistle has been revered since the Middle Ages in Europe for its use as a digestive stimulant and nutritive tonic. This herb is approved by the German Commission E for its ability to increase appetite and support the digestive process and is also an approved food additive in the United States for its flavoring of liqueurs such as Benedictine. Blessed thistle is considered energetically cooling and drying with a bitter taste. Another common name of blessed thistle is holy thistle. Because the plant had a reputation in Medieval Europe as a cure for the plague and "other diseases of melancholy," it also became known as holy thistle and St. Benedict's thistle. Precautions Persons with allergies to other members of the Asteraceae family (such as feverfew, chamomile, or Echinacea species) should exercise caution with Blessed Thistle as allergic cross-reactivity to Asteraceae plants is common. May reduce the effectiveness of H2-blockers and proton pump inhibitors. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Cascara Sagrada Bark Powder, Wild harvested, 1oz. bag
Short description: Cascara Sagrada Bark Powder, Wild harvested, 1oz. bag Frangula purshiana This aged bark is a mild laxative that affects the colon, spleen, stomach, and liver. The bitterness stimulates the digestive secretions of the gastrointestinal system including the liver, gallbladder, stomach, and pancreas. It is considered one of the safest tonic-laxative herbs and can be used on a daily basis for chronic constipation if necessary. It is also useful for colitis, hemorrhoids, liver failure, and jaundice. Cascara sagrada is a large shrub found in the Pacific Northwest and western Canada. The plant was given its common name meaning “sacred bark” by Spanish missionaries who were awed after witnessing the herb’s effectiveness. Traditionally, Frangula purshiana was utilized by indigenous tribes for its healthful properties and as an occasional, mild laxative. Our cascara sagrada powder is milled from bark after one year of aging and can be made into tablets or used in extract making. The herb is harvested in the form of quills and pieces of bark, allowed to age at least a year before use in laxative preparations. Cascara sagrada is never to be used fresh and must be aged for at least a year to break down its anthrone chemicals.  Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. We also sell Cascara Sagrada Bark in cut and sifted form if you are looking for a non-powdered form. Precautions Not for use in pregnancy or lactation except under the supervision of a qualified healthcare practitioner. Contraindicated with intestinal obstruction, abdominal pain, or any inflammatory condition of the intestines. Not for use in excess of 8 days unless under the supervision of a qualified healthcare practitioner. We recommend that you consult with a qualified healthcare practitioner before using herbal products, particularly if you are pregnant, nursing, or on any medications. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Corn Silk, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Corn Silk, Organic, 1oz. bag Zea mays Corn silk is a diuretic with an affinity for the kidneys and urinary tract, especially when heat is present. Considered energetically cooling and demulcent, corn silk is sometimes used in traditional folk herbalism as a tonic herb. Corn silk is typically prepared fresh as a tincture or can be dried and used in herbal tea blends and as a stand-alone infusion. Most people are familiar with corn silk as the glossy strands that stubbornly cling to a fresh ear of corn. Although most people toss this material, dried cornsilk makes a tasty tea since it contains the same compounds found in mint and in thyme. Be aware, however, that corn silk may increase the effects of diuretics, such as furosemide (Lasix). Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. You may also be interested in our Urinary Tract Health tea. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Dandelion Root Roasted Granules, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Roasted Dandelion Root Granules, Organic, 1oz. bag Taraxacum offinale Roasted dandelion root has a long history of being used as a coffee substitute, particularly during times of economic hardship or coffee shortages. Dandelion root has a similar appearance and texture to coffee beans and when roasted, it develops a similar flavor profile. During World War II, for example, coffee was rationed and dandelion root was often used as an alternative. The practice of using dandelion root as a coffee substitute dates back even further, with some sources claiming that it was used during the American Civil War and in the Great Depression. Dandelion root coffee is made by harvesting the roots of the dandelion plant, washing and drying them, roasting them until they are dark brown and then grounding them. The resulting powder can be used to brew a beverage that is said to have a similar taste to coffee. Some people claim that dandelion root coffee is less bitter and has a slightly sweeter taste than traditional coffee. Dandelion is high in antioxidants, minerals and inulin, a type of soluble fiber. We also offer local Dandelion Root from Foster Farm Botanicals as well as Dandelion Tincture. Note that this product is the Roasted Dandelion Root GRAINS or GRANULES, so is a more finely ground Roasted Dandelion Root. We also have a chunkier cut and sifted version of the Roasted Dandelion Root. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Frankincense Resin, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description: Frankincense Resin, Organic, 1 oz. bag Boswellia sacra Frankincense resin is gathered by making incisions in the small, deciduous tree, Boswellia sacra. The yellow-hued pitch is often used as incense or in perfumery. Frankincense has been considered an herb of spirituality with lore dating back thousands of years. The aromatic resin can be used alone or blended into incense formulas. Frankincense and the oil produced from it has been known for its magical powers and its ability to improve communication with the creator in the Middle East for thousands of years before it was made a gift to Christ by the Magi. There are over 52 references to it in the Bible. Egyptian records show a great many references to it including its use in cosmetics, perfumes and as an embalming agent. The harvest of gums and resins takes place during the dry season, as they are easily damaged by rain. A number of incisions are made into the bark, and the gum resins are allowed to ooze out and solidify for a few weeks. The harvesters then return to each tree to collect the resin. The resins are then transported to local villages where they are further dried in the shade. Frankincense is a member for the Burseraceae family. Boswellia is a cousin of Frankincense, you may be interested in Boswellia Tincture. This tree resin extract is a potent source of various anti-inflammatory compounds. We also carry Frankincense Essential Oil. It smells divine! This Frankincense Resin is sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Gum Arabic Powder, Organic, 1oz. bag
Short description: Gum Arabic Powder, Organic, 1oz. bag Acacia senegal Gum Arabic is a plant-derived fiber that's often used as a natural thickening agent or binder to hold ingredients together, helping to stabilize baked goods, herbal medicines and emulsions in skin care, adding natural soluble fiber to recipes. It is also sometimes called acacia gum or acacia powder, and is a fibrous product made from the natural hardened sap of two types of wild Acacia trees. Due to its fiber content, it has been traditionally used to feed beneficial probiotics in the gut, for IBS like symptoms, to enhance fullness and regulate cholesterol. There has also been some research into gum arabic's possible ability to improve the bioavailability of dietary supplements and CBD. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Andrographis Tincture 2oz.
Short description: Andrographis Tincture 2oz. Andrographis paniculata Andrographis is a powerful bitter that may be used to stimulate immune function and support a healthy inflammation response. The incredible bitterness of this plant means it may have a blood sugar lowering effect. It should only be used in smaller doses; large doses may cause griping (gastrointestinal pain & constipation). However, do not let this deter you as this plant has remarkable properties in combatting various bacteria, viruses, fungi, etc. In addition to this, Andrographis is part of the Stephen Buhner Lyme Protocol. Consider taking it alongside our Cat’s Claw tincture for added immune support. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Yarrow Tincture, Wild Harvested, 2oz.
Short description: Yarrow Tincture, Wild Harvested, 2oz. Achillea millefolium Yarrow has a long history and is named after the great warrior Achilles, the great hero of the Trojan War. The actions of this plant are: astringent, anti-inflammatory, hemostatic, as a tonic for the vascular system, diaphoretic and antifever, antiseptic and vulnerary, as well as an aromatic digestive bitter. This plant is also a good herb for menstrual cramps and varicose veins. Try it on bug bites, as it's drawing qualities may help to draw out the poison and soothe the itch. This Yarrow Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from Locally Wildcrafted Fresh Aerial Parts. Extracted in 47.5% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:2. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Japanese Chlorella Powder, 1 oz bag
Short description: Japanese Chlorella (Chlorella vulgaris) is an algae that is considered by many health experts to be a “super food”. It has a dense nutrient profile and is thought to be helpful in promoting detoxification of heavy metals. Chlorella vulgaris is a single-celled algae and considered to be among the Earth’s oldest living organisms. Chlorella is enjoyed for its healthful qualities and can be added to spice blends, popcorn, and egg dishes. Chlorella powder can also be added to smoothies, encapsulated, or tinctured. This chlorella powder has a more mild algae flavor and makes a deep green brew when added to water. Our Japanese chlorella powder is cultivated in concrete-lined ponds in a pristine area of Japan. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. You may also be interested in Cilantro Heavy Metal Detox™ With Chlorella 2oz tincture. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Psyllium Husk Powder 1 oz bag
Short description: Psyllium husk is demulcent and helps to provide support for the digestive track. Our psyllium powder is ground from Plantago ovata husks and can be used in cooking as a thickening agent.  Psyllium is mucilaginous and swells up when introduced to water. The ground or whole husk must always be taken with at least 1 full glass of water. Because of its rather neutral flavor it may be added to most food dishes. Precautions Take with at least 250 mL (8 oz.) of water. Taking this product without adequate fluid may cause it to swell and block your throat or esophagus and may cause choking. Do not take this product if you have difficulty in swallowing. Other drugs should be taken one hour prior to consumption of psyllium or several hours after consumption, as psyllium may reduce the absorption of certain drugs due to the mucilage content and the increased speed of passage through the intestines. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Short description: Sweet Annie, Vermont Grown Organic, 1 oz bag Artemisia annua Our Sweet Annie is organically grown by Foster Farm Botanicals in East Calais, Vermont and it is the highest quality around. Some of Sweet Annie's actions are antibacterial, antiparasitic, antimarial, antiseptic, bitter and carminative. Sweet Annie contains artemisinin, which recent studies suggest exhibit antibacterial activity against certain tick-borne pathogens, including the causative agent of Lyme disease, Borrelia burgdorferi, as well as Babesia spp. It's anti-inflammatory and immunomodulatory effects could also aid in reducing inflammation and supporting the immune system in response to vector-borne infections. Our Yaupon teas are a true labor of love. Each leaf is hand-plucked, carefully dried or fire-roasted, graded and milled, and hand-packed in our facility in Edgewater, Florida. We don’t outsource any aspect of production, because we won’t compromise on quality. Yaupon Brothers has a policy of transparency, because we’re proud of our craft and we want to share it with the world. Name: Solomon’s Seal Granules, 1 oz bag
Short description: Solomon’s Seal Granules, 1 oz bag Polygonatum biflorum  Solomon’s Seal is truly a remarkable remedy for the muscular and skeletal system. I have personally used it to heal my injured back and given it to many clients with success. According to Matthew Wood: “It is suited to a wide range of problems affecting the joints, ligaments, tendons, and muscles. It tightens or loosens tendons and attachments (depending on which is needed), strengthens and repairs joint damage, soothes…many kinds of arthritis in the joints, and works nicely with repetitive-injury problems such as tennis elbow, jogger’s knee, and carpal-tunnel syndrome”(The Practice of Traditional Western Herbalism pp. 191). Name: Stinging Nettles 101 Workshop
Short description:
Explore the World of Stinging Nettles with Us! May 18th 9:30am - Noon
Ready for an exciting journey into the realm of Stinging Nettles? Come along with us for an immersive class that promises both adventure and learning! We'll kick things off at the herb shop, then head to a local farm to gather fresh Stinging Nettle tops. Back at the shop, get ready to unlock the full potential of this incredible plant as we delve into its medicinal and culinary wonders. During our time together, we'll whip up some nourishing nettle tea, prepare batches for future use in the dehydrator, and create a delicious Fresh Nettle Puree—ideal for freezing and adding a nutritious boost to your favorite dishes or herbal remedies. Don't forget to bring your gloves and a trusty basket or bucket if you're keen on taking some nettles home. And for those with a green thumb, we've got you covered! Bring your own bucket, and we'll happily send you off with nettles to plant. Just a heads up—they're known to thrive, so be prepared for a garden takeover! For just $40 per person, you'll have the chance to harvest as many nettles as you can carry and gain valuable insights into the fascinating world of this remarkable plant. Don't miss out on this opportunity—reserve your spot today!

Name: Silk Tree Bark, 1 oz bag
Short description: Silk Tree Bark, Wild harvested, 1 oz bag Albizia julibrissin The silk tree, also known as the mimosa tree, is commonly referred to as ‘happiness tree’ in Traditional Chinese Medicine due to its nervine properties and promotion of positive emotional state. The bark can be used in the form of a tea or tincture and can also be powered to make capsules or external pastes. Consuming as a tea before bed can soothe the nerves to promote a night of sound sleep. Traditionally it has also been used to support someone processing grief or loss and is often combined with Hawthorn for this purpose. Additionally, this bark is used for general skin irritation and can be incorporated in skin care routines in the form of serums, tinctures, and creams. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. You may also be interested in Hawthorn Berries.  These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Mullein Leaf Powder, 1 oz bag
Short description: Mullein Leaf Powder, 1 oz bag Mullein (Verbascum thapsus) is a common weed that acts as a powerful expectorant and demulcent for respiratory complaints. It soothes inflamed passageways of respiratory and urinary passageways. Helpful with dry coughs and hoarseness.   It has a mild action on the lymphatic system and can be combined with stronger lymphatic herbs. Note that this is the powdered form of mullein leaf, we also carry Mullein in cut and sifted in bulk. We use the powdered form of mullein in our Anthelmintic Powder blend, which many of our local goat friends appreciate for keeping parasites at bay. Also consider taking our Mullein tincture. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Partridgeberry, 1 oz bag
Short description: Partridgeberry, 1 oz bag Mitchella repens Wildharvested Partridgeberry is a creeping, evergreen plant Native to eastern North America that can be found growing in woodland habitats and along streambanks. Many indigenous people of North America used partridgeberry as an emmenagogue, astringent, diuretic, parturient and styptic. It has also traditionally been used for urinary tract disorders including easing infections, interstitial cystitis, and BPH as a diuretic and astringent. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. You may also be interested in our Urinary Tract Tea blend or UT Balance Tincture. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Name: Pipsissewa, 1 oz bag
Short description: Pipsissewa, 1 oz bag Chimaphila umbellata Wildharvested Pipsissewa, Native to southern Canada and the northern United States, has astringent leaves that are also bitter and cool. The leaves have an affinity for the bladder, heart, small intestine and spleen. Medicinal properties include being used as a diuretic, astringent, alterative, aperient, and a bitter tonic. Pipsissewa herb can be decocted as tea, extracted, or prepared for topical application. Michael Tierra, in The Way of Herbs, writes of using Pipsissewa for urinary inflammations in a formula that includes two parts pipsissewa, one part uva ursi, half a part marshamallow root, and one quarter part ginger. Other traditional uses include arthritis and rheumatic conditions. You may also be interested in our UT Balance Tincture.  Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Reishi Mushroom Red Powder, Organic, 1 oz bag
Short description: Reishi Mushroom Red Powder, Organic, 1 oz bag Ganoderma Lucidum  Reishi Mushroom is sometimes called “the mushroom of immortality” because of its powerful adaptogenic qualities. Scientific research into the compounds responsible for Reishi mushroom activity began in the 1970’s in China and Japan. Scientists discovered highly active beta-(1-3)(1-6)-glucans with the ability to potentiate innate immunity by activating immune cells. Also discovered were secondary metabolites called triterpenoids which were present in significant amounts and sets Reishi apart from all the other medicinal mushrooms. We also offer Vermont Reishi Tincture that is very popular. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. Store in a cool, dry, place out of direct sunlight. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Mucuna Powder, Organic, 1 oz bag
Short description: Mucuna Powder, Organic, 1 oz bag Mucuna pruriens Mucuna pruriens seed assists in brain function, libido, and supporting muscle growth. Mucuna pruriens contains high concentrations of L-Dopa, a neurotransmitter that prompts a positive mental state of action and assertiveness. Considered energetically warming in nature, mucuna seeds have a long history of use in Ayurveda and traditional Unani healing practices. Referred to as kapikacchu in Ayurveda, mucuna was employed for thousands of years as a tridoshic herb. Both sweet and bitter, kapikacchu was traditionally seen in Ayurveda as a building herb with an affinity for the nervous system, brain, and reproductive system. In Traditional Chinese Medicine, mucuna was viewed as a deeply nourishing herb and was often employed as an adaptogen to enhance overall wellbeing. Traditional Ayurvedic preparations of mucuna bean including mixing the powder with ghee or milk and honey. The powder can even be added to smoothies for a healthful kick. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: White Oak Bark, 1 oz bag
Short description: White Oak Bark, 1 oz bag Quercus alba Quercus alba is native to eastern and central North America. A distinguished hardwood, white oak is named after the light color of its finished wood. White oak bark is astringent and used for its beneficial qualities. White oak bark can be used in baths, washes, infusions, and tinctures. Being astringent in nature thanks to the tannins it contains, it can help to tighten and tone the tissues of the digestive system, aiding in problems such as diarrhea. It's toning qualities may also help in the vascular system with issues such as varicose veins. It's diuretic qualities bring support to the kidneys and bladder. White Oak Bark is also a source of iron and vitamin B12. It also has a history of being used as an antiseptic, antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory. It has traditionally been used as a gargle for sore throats. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Being astringent in nature thanks to the tannins it contains, it can help to tighten and tone the tissues of the digestive system, aiding in problems such as diarrhea. It's toning qualities may also help in the vascular system with issues such as varicose veins. It's diuretic qualities bring support to the kidneys and bladder. White Oak Bark is also a source of iron and vitamin B12. It also has a history of being used as an antiseptic, antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory. It has traditionally been used as a gargle for sore throats. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: White Pine Bark, 1 oz bag
Short description: White Pine Bark, 1 oz bag Pinus strobus  White pine, also known as cluster pine and maritime pine, is a species of pine native to the Mediterranean region, particularly the coastlines of France, Italy, Portugal and Spain. While the timber is important in the forestry industry, the thick, reddish bark is harvested for its abundant collection of antioxidant compounds. In fact, white pine bark is available as an over-the-counter supplement blend marketed as Pycnogenol®. The naturopath and herbalist Dr. Aviva Romm writes about Pine Bark studies showing its effectiveness for reduction of pain from endometriosis. White Pine Bark is also a common ingredient in cough syrups and tea blends formulated for congestion. Try it in tea blends, with its slightly bitter but pleasant flavor. White Pine Bark is rich in vitamin C (just like it's needles) and is also antiseptic, helping to support immune and respiratory function. We also carry capsules of Pycnogenol® French Maritime Pine Bark Extract. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: St. John's Wort Oil
Short description: St. John's Wort Oil St. John's Wort Flowering Tops infused in Organic Coconut Oil. We harvested these flowers at their peak of potency from right here at our Rogue gardens in Morrisville, Vermont. They were sun infused while still fresh, turning the oil a beautiful reddish pink color. Coconut oil hardens to a nice salve consistency at cooler temps and will melt to liquid at warmer temperatures; you can even keep in the fridge if you'd like to keep firm in hot summer temperatures. St. John's Wort oil is anti-inflammatory and applied topically is helpful for pain, nerve damage, bruises, swelling, sprains, burns, and rashes. You can also take our St. John's Wort tincture internally at the same time. Available in two sizes, 1 oz. or 2 oz. glass jars. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Oyster Mushroom Medley, 1 oz bag
Short description: Oyster Mushroom Medley, 1 oz bag This Medley of Oyster Mushrooms includes Blue Oyster, Black Pearl King Oyster, Italian Oyster, and Pearl Oyster Mushrooms. Oyster mushrooms are full of nutritional benefits, have immune modulating properties, and are a great source of antioxidants. Oyster mushrooms are also a rich source of beta-glucans which are a natural source of anti-tumor, anti-inflammatory, anti-obesity, anti-allergic, anti-osteoporotic, and immunomodulating activities and help in the reduction of cholesterol. This beautiful dried medley of oyster mushrooms were grown by Ten Mile Mushrooms in Pennsylvania. They are excellent added to soup stocks and and medicinal broths. You may also like our Turkey Tail Mushrooms, Lion's Mane Mushrooms and Reishi Slices. Make a whole medicinal mushroom stock! Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. Store in a cool, dry, place out of direct sunlight. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Elecampane Tincture, 2 oz.
Short description: Elecampane Tincture, Organic, 2 oz. Inula helenium Elecampane is a wonderful choice for respiratory complaints, specifically chronic coughs, asthma, and bronchitis. It is also quite bitter and has a tonic effect on digestion. The root is a source of the prebiotic fiber Inulin which helps feed the flora in our GI tract. It is also incorporated into many parasite formulas because of its vermifuge quality. This Elecampane Tincture is part of our Artisan Collection of tinctures and products that we make on site in Morrisville, Vermont, and is made from Organic Dried Roots. Extracted in 70% Organic Cane Alcohol & Reverse Osmosis Maple Water. Herb Strength Ratio: 1:4. Take 30 drops in water or juice, 1 – 3 times daily, or as needed. You may also be interested in our Elecampane Roots in bulk, our Sweet Fern Cough Syrup, or our Respiratory Health Blend of Tea. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Turkey Tail Dual Extract 2oz.
Short description:
Turkey Tail Dual Extract 2oz. 
 
 
 
This Turkey Tail extract is made with Vermont grown organic Turkey Tail Fruiting Bodies. Shade-grown on hardwood at Wild Branch Valley Farm in Craftsbury, Vermont, this tincture is made with Trametes versicolor (Coriolus), commonly known as Turkey Tail. It is a powerful immunomodulator that is useful for all conditions when immunity has been compromised. Turkey Tail is a rich source of Beta Glucans and unique protein-bound polysaccharides. This extract is made by decocting the fruiting body and then tincturing with organic cane alcohol. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Short description:
Activated Charcoal, 100 Capsules
Activated charcoal is used within the digestive tract. This charcoal has been treated to increase its ability to adsorb (attract and hold to its surface) gases, liquids, and dissolved substances.
100% Pure Activated Charcoal Digestive Aid

Name: Magnesium Flakes 1.65 LB
Short description:
Magnesium Flakes 1.65 LB (26.4 oz) 
 
 
 
Pure Magnesium Flakes. Super Concentrated. Soak in luxury to relax and rejuvenate body and soul with quality magnesium flakes from the ancient Zechstein Seabed. 
 
 
 
Pure Magnesium Flakes are highly concentrated crystals of magnesium chloride sources from the Ancient Zechstein Seabed in the Netherlands. Nothing added and nothing removed. Restore and Refresh your body and mind by using these flakes in a full bath or foot soak. One cup of flakes contains approximately 90grams of magnesium chloride and numerous naturally occurring trace elements from ancient seawater. 
 
 
 
Directions: Add 1-2 cups of flakes to the bathtub or footbath, then soak for a minimum of 20 minutes. For best results, the temperature of the magnesium bath should be warm, about 101F to 105F, rather than hot. 
 
 
 
For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. If irritation, redness, or discomfort occurs, discontinue use and consult a licensed health care practitioner. 
 
 
 
Ingredients: Magnesium Chloride Hexahydrate (Magnesium Flakes). 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate 32 fl. oz.
Short description:
Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate 32 fl. oz. 
 
 
 
Tart cherries are known by several names, including dwarf cherries or sour cherries, but don’t start puckering just yet—they’ve got a sweet kick to them, too, making for the perfect flavor balance. But that’s just the surface level of what makes this concentrate great. Inside each bottle you’ll find vitamins A, C and K, along with minerals and nutrients such as copper, manganese and potassium. And if you need to chill out, tart cherries can help you dial it down a notch thanks to naturally-occurring melatonin, and the compounds tryptophan and anthocyanins, which encourage your body to create melatonin. Tart cherries also offer five times the antioxidants of sweet cherries, but our concentrate takes that antioxidant profile even further by packing the antioxidant power of 1000* tart cherries in each 32-oz bottle. That’s a lot of goodness loaded into one concentrate! Traditionally used for relief from inflammation and gout. 
 
 
 
Untainted by sweeteners, preservatives, and other additives, Dynamic Health Certified Organic Tart Cherry Juice is nothing more than pure, natural power and nutrition. Extracted from sun-ripened montmorency and balaton tart cherries, our 100% juice concentrate contains the antioxidant power of 1000* tart cherries in each 32-oz bottle along with naturally occurring nutrients. 
 
 
 
Perfectly tasty on its own or mixed with seltzer, smoothies, sauces, dressings, and vinaigrettes, it's easy to take a serving each day. And because our Tart Cherry Juice Concentrate is certified organic, gluten free, vegan, BPA free, Halal, and Kosher, there's no reason not to! 
 
 
 
Trust one of nature's most powerful elixirs to deliver extraordinary taste and nutrition. 
 
 
 
100% Tart Cherry Concentrate - Nothing else added! No added sugar. Kosher. 
 
 
 
Serving Size: 2 tablespoons (30mL) of Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate. May be mixed with water, seltzer, juice or a beverage of your choice. Take with at least 250mL (8oz) of liquid. 
 
 
 
Store in a cool, dry, dark place. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Testosterone Elite, 30 Capsules
Short description: Testosterone Elite, 30 Capsules Promotes Free and Total Testosterone Seeking to maintain healthy testosterone levels? Men need testosterone to build muscle and maintain sexual health, but levels decline over time. Testosterone Elite features a proprietary blend of pomegranate and cacao extracts with luteolin. These nutrients complement each other’s mechanisms of action, supporting testosterone production and encouraging youthful free and total testosterone levels. Testosterone is an essential hormone the body uses to maintain sex drive, bone mass, muscle mass and strength and more. But factors like poor nutrition, age, and stress cause the body to produce less and less of this important hormone. The result? Less testosterone than your body needs. Testosterone Elite combines nutrients that work together to support youthful testosterone production and healthy hormone levels. This product is intended to promote testosterone levels but does not contain testosterone. Serving Size: 1 Vegetarian Capsule Amount Per Serving: Tesnor [std. to ≥ 3.5% punicalagins, ≥ 0.5% theobromine from pomegranate (peel) extract, cacao (Theobroma cacoa) (seed) extract] 400 mg Luteolin  [from Japanese sophora (flower) extract] 275 mg Other Ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, stearic acid, silica, rice fiber These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: NAD+ Cell Regenerator, 300 mg, 30 Capsules
Short description:
NAD+ Cell Regenerator, 300 mg, 30 Capsules NAD+ is a cellular coenzyme that’s found in every cell of our bodies. NAD+ is necessary to create adenosine triphosphate (ATP), the compound the body uses for fuel. NAD+ Cell Regenerator™ helps maintain youthful levels of NAD+ with 300 mg of NIAGEN®, the first commercially available form of nicotinamide riboside, to help fight general fatigue at the cellular level.
  • Contains a clinically studied form of nicotinamide riboside to support energy
  • Supports healthy levels of the coenzyme NAD+
  • NAD+ is used in the production of cellular energy

  • Nicotinamide Riboside does not cause flushing.

Name: Eidon Selenium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz
Short description:
Eidon Selenium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz

Eidon’s Ionic Liquid Selenium supports a healthy immune system, thyroid and liver function, and breast and prostate tissues. Selenium is involved as a catalyst in several important enzymes. The most well-known function is in the liver where selenium catalyzes or activates the glutathione peroxidase enzyme. This enzyme plays its most significant role in the liver as it cleanses the blood. Without it, the liver could not do its job properly leaving our system full of toxins.

Selenium plays an important role in the thyroid where, along with Iodine, it catalyzes the T4 and T3 enzymes which are critical for energy production. Along with the thyroid, Selenium is also found in sizable amounts in healthy breast and prostate tissues. Selenium is not widespread in the earth’s soils. Consequently, the ability to obtain Selenium in our foods on a regular basis is difficult at best. Supplementation is the best way to insure a steady supply and a steady supply is essential for optimal health.

Suggested intake: 30 drops (2ml) daily in water; suitable for children - children under five dosage is 15 drops. Eidon Liquid Minerals are All Natural, Highly Bioavailable and contain NO sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors, preservatives or animal by-products. Vegan and Gluten-Free.

Amount Per Serving (as sodium selenate): 260mcg Other Ingredients: De-ionized water You may also be interested in Eidon Zinc Liquid and the other Eidon Ionic Minerals we carry. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Matcha Tea Powder, Organic, 1 oz. bag
Short description: Matcha Tea Powder, Organic, 1 oz. bag Camellia sinensis Matcha is a powerful form of green tea. It contains nutrients from the entire tea leaf, giving it more caffeine and antioxidants than typically found in green tea. Matcha is also known for its bold green hue and delicious, mildly sweet and nutty flavor. The flavor is particularly vegetal, with some notes of bitterness in addition to the sweetness. This is a healthy tea that will give you consistent, calm energy. It is filled with antioxidants and vitamins. To brew: bring water to about 175 degrees, not quite boiling. Use about 1 teaspoon for about ¼ cup of water. Sift the powder into a bowl and add water. Use a bamboo or small kitchen whisk to incorporate into a frothy brew or add sifted powder and water to a mason jar and shake. Matcha is a strong, concentrated cup of tea because the entire leaf is ground into a powder and whisked into a tea. You can dilute with milk for a latte and also add sweetener to taste. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Cardio Peak, 30 Vegetarian Capsules
Short description: Cardio Peak 30 Vegetarian capsules What Is Cardio Peak™? Stay young at heart with Cardio Peak™. The Terminalia arjuna bark extract in this formula supports cardiovascular endurance, helps reduce physical fatigue and maintains healthy cardiac output: the strength and relative efficiency of your heart’s capacity to pump blood. Your heart is a muscle. Help keep it strong as you age with Cardio Peak™, formulated with a standardized, clinically studied arjuna extract. Cardio Peak™ benefits: Supports cardiovascular endurance Helps maintain heart muscle health Helps maintain the heart’s blood-pumping capacity Helps reduce physical fatigue during exercise Stay young at heart with Cardio Peak™! For centuries, arjuna bark has been used to support cardiovascular health. Rich in polyphenols and glycosides, arjuna is clinically studied to encourage healthy cardiac output and maintain a strong, healthy heart. Plus, studies show that arjuna helps enhance exercise performance for active adults. Our formula provides 400 mg of standardized arjuna extract to promote a strong and healthy heart. You may also be interested in our Hawthorn Berries or Turmeric Heart Complete Capsules.   These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
