Name: Enhanced Super Digestive Enzymes, 60 capsules
Short description:
Enhanced Super Digestive Enzymes, 60 capsules Supports digestion, comfort, and GI balance for plant-based diets. This Best in Class formula contains 10 vegetarian-friendly enzymes plus the probiotic B. coagulans to support GI balance, break down plant-based diets, and digest macros like protein, dairy, starches and fat. Research has shown that supplementing with digestive enzymes can promote optimal digestion and absorption of nutrients from the foods you eat. Non-GMO Vegetarian Supplement Facts Serving Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule Amount Per Serving Vegetarian Digestive Enzyme Blend - 140mg: Protease SP (A. oryzae, B. subtilis) 25,000 FCC (HUT) Bromelain (A. comosus) 800,000 FCC (PU) Lactase (A. oryzae) 2,000 FCC (ALU) Cellulase (A. niger) 2,000 FCC (CU) Lipase (C. rugosa) 2,500 FCC (FIP) Alpha Galactosidase (A. niger) 150 (GalU) Hemicellulase (A. niger) 4,000 (HCU) Pectinase (A. niger) 25 (endo-PGU) Protease 3.0 (A. niger) 10 (SAPU) Xylanase (T. longibrachiatum) 500 (XU) Lactospore® B. coagulans MTCC5856 - 10 mg 1 billion CFU (Colony Forming Units at time of manufacture) Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, medium chain triglycerides. Contains wheat, soybeans Dosage and Use: Take one (1) capsule one to two times daily prior to the heaviest meals, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner. Warning:
  • KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN
  • DO NOT EXCEED RECOMMENDED DOSE
  • Do not purchase if outer seal is broken or damaged.
  • When using nutritional supplements, please consult with your physician if you are undergoing treatment for a medical condition or if you are pregnant or lactating.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Psyllium Husk Capsules, 1 oz
Short description: Psyllium Husk Capsules, 1 oz Plantago ovata Psyllium husk is demulcent and helps to provide support for the digestive track. Psyllium is mucilaginous and swells up when introduced to water. The ground or whole husk or capsule must always be taken with at least 1 full glass of water (8oz). Precautions Take with at least 250 mL (8 oz.) of water. Taking this product without adequate fluid may cause it to swell and block your throat or esophagus and may cause choking. Do not take this product if you have difficulty in swallowing. Other drugs should be taken one hour prior to consumption of psyllium or several hours after consumption, as psyllium may reduce the absorption of certain drugs due to the mucilage content and the increased speed of passage through the intestines. Contraindicated in bowel obstruction, esophageal stenosis, and abnormal intestinal narrowing. Directions: As a dietary supplement, take 2 capsules daily with meals or water. Store in a cool, dry place. Contents: Organic Psyllium Husk (Plantago ovata). Vegetable Capsule Ingredients: Pullulan, water, carrageenan, and potassium chloride. Product contains no fillers or additives. Sold in 1 oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. 1 oz is about 40 capsules. We also offer Psyllium Husk Powder in bulk. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Yerba Mate, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description:
This light green beverage hYerba Mate is a traditional South American drink made from the leaves and twigs of the Ilex paraguariensis plant. It’s commonly enjoyed from a gourd using a shared straw, symbolizing friendship and acceptance.as a bold, full-bodied flavor and is typically prepared with just hot water. Our Green Yerba Mate is made from pure leaves, with minimal stems, and is warm air-dried (smoke-free) and aged for at least 9 months to mellow its natural bitterness. 
 
 
 
Yerba Mate is naturally caffeinated and rich in antioxidants, minerals, amino acids, and B vitamins, making it a healthy choice. It offers a smooth, satisfying taste, less acidic than coffee, and contains slightly less caffeine. 
 
 
 
You can enjoy Yerba Mate on its own or enhance it with milk, sweeteners, honey, lemon, fruits, or other herbs like mint or lemongrass. It’s versatile and tastes great hot or cold, whether as a latte, smoothie, or refreshing iced tea. Contains caffeine.

It’s commonly enjoyed from a gourd using a shared straw, symbolizing friendship and acceptance. This light green beverage has a bold, full-bodied flavor and is typically prepared with just hot water. Our Green Yerba Mate is made from pure leaves, with minimal stems, and is warm air-dried (smoke-free) and aged for at least 9 months to mellow its natural bitterness. Name: Pro-Resolving Mediators 30 capsules
Short description:
Pro-Resolving Mediators 30 capsules Certain compounds encourage a healthy inflammatory response in the body. But what about a healthy post-inflammatory response? To truly “bounce back,” your body uses pro-resolving mediators.
The body creates specialized pro-resolving mediators (PRMs) from fatty acids such as EPA and DHA omega-3s. It then uses those pro-resolving mediators to promote a healthy post-inflammatory response, supporting healthy tissue rejuvenation and maintaining the vital balance between cytokine compounds. This formula combines PRMs and PRM precursors.

The body uses pro-resolving mediators to support healthy tissue rejuvenation and to “clean up” cellular debris.

Pro-Resolving Mediators Benefits

In the body, pro-resolving mediators:
  • Encourage the body’s natural processes for healthy tissue rejuvenation
  • Promote the body’s natural pathways for clearing cellular debris
  • Help maintain the body’s natural balance between cytokine compounds
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct
Short description:
DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct 
 
Promotes optimal hormone balance & overall health 
 
 
 
The benefits of DHEA supplements include maintaining youthful levels of the hormone, while also encouraging healthy immune function, cardiovascular health, healthy sexual function and more. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine. 
 
 
 
There are a ton of hormones in the human body, but the most abundant ones circulating through our bloodstream is DHEA and this hormone does some excellent stuff for our bodies. It helps us balance other hormones while promoting healthy immune function, circulatory health, healthy sexual function, and more. It even helps us maintain our mood, but levels of this important hormone begin to decline over time. 
 
 
 
That's what prompted our experts to scour through the latest research and create our DHEA formula. Gluten-free and non-GMO, our DHEA is available in four different dosages to meet your specific needs.
Description:
DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct Promotes optimal hormone balance & overall health The benefits of DHEA supplements include maintaining youthful levels of the hormone, while also encouraging healthy immune function, cardiovascular health, healthy sexual function and more. There are a ton of hormones in the human body, but the most abundant ones circulating through our bloodstream is DHEA and this hormone does some excellent stuff for our bodies. It helps us balance other hormones while promoting healthy immune function, circulatory health, healthy sexual function, and more. It even helps us maintain our mood, but levels of this important hormone begin to decline over time. That's what prompted our experts to scour through the latest research and create our DHEA formula. Gluten-free and non-GMO, our DHEA is available in four different dosages to meet your specific needs. So start promoting your optimal hormone balance and overall health with DHEA from life extension. You'll be glad you did. Body composition, mood & more In a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study, 10 months of DHEA supplementation in elderly individuals resulted in increased strength and lean muscle mass from resistance exercise.1 DHEA regimens promote healthy sexual function, support memory and mood, as well as have a beneficial impact on cognition and the brain.2-9
Cardio, circulatory & bone health DHEA has beneficial cardiovascular effects.3 It also promotes bone health.10-12 In a randomized, double-blind, controlled trial, one year of DHEA supplementation helped increase bone mineral density in the hips of older adults and spinal bone mineral density in older women.12

Supplement Facts

Serving Size 1 vegetarian capsule
Amount Per Serving
Dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA) 100 mg
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule).
Non-GMO
Dosage and Use
  • The exact number of capsules to be taken should be determined by blood testing and the advice of a physician.
  • Generally, take one (1) to three (3) capsules in the morning only.
  • DHEA serum blood tests are suggested 3 to 6 weeks after initiating DHEA replacement therapy to optimize individual dosing.
Caution
Consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product if you are at risk for or have been diagnosed with prostate or breast cancer. Possible side effects include acne, hair loss, hair growth on the face (in women), and increased levels of estrogen.

Our bodies only need small amounts of trace minerals, but they are still vital to our health.

Zinc deficiency becomes more common as we get older, making supplementing with it essential for immune health. Only Trace Minerals can help maintain optimal levels.

Only Trace Minerals Benefits

  • Supports healthy body function
  • Promotes healthy immune function
  • Helps maintain already-healthy blood sugar levels
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description:
Only Trace Minerals Capsules, 90ct Mineral Booster Trace minerals play an important role in hundreds of body functions, from immune system support to healthy bones and joints. Only Trace Minerals provides bioavailable forms of minerals in one convenient supplement.

Our bodies only need small amounts of trace minerals, but they are still vital to our health.

Zinc deficiency becomes more common as we get older, making supplementing with it essential for immune health. Only Trace Minerals can help maintain optimal levels.

Only Trace Minerals Benefits

  • Supports healthy body function
  • Promotes healthy immune function
  • Helps maintain already-healthy blood sugar levels

Product Details

Zinc stimulates the activity of approximately 300 enzymes. Zinc also promotes immune function, taste sensitivity, protein, DNA and RNA synthesis, healthy insulin response and more.1-2 Age-related declines in immune function are associated with zinc deficiency. Certain aspects of immune function in the elderly have been found to be supported with zinc supplementation.3
Chromium plays an important role in maintaining healthy blood sugar levels in those within normal range when used as part of a healthy diet.4 Boron is an essential nutrient for supporting optimal calcium metabolism as well as healthy bones and joints.5 Boron intake may also support a healthy prostate. It's been shown to help inhibit oxidative stress and support the body’s normal use of reproductive hormones and vitamin D.6 Vanadyl sulfate is an effective form of the trace mineral vanadium. Research indicates vanadyl sulfate may support insulin response and help maintain already-healthy glucose metabolism.7,8 Research also indicates vanadium salts may help maintain already-healthy blood pressure, thyroid health and iron metabolism.9 Copper is required by the body to convert iron into a form that can be utilized by hemoglobin, and is an essential constituent of many important enzymes, including superoxide dismutase, a major cellular antioxidant. It’s also needed for normal immune function and synthesis of certain proteins.10 People who consume over 50 mg of zinc daily and/or a high level of fructose are advised to supplement their diet with 2 mg copper several times per week.11,12

Supplement Facts

Serving Size 1 vegetarian capsule
Amount Per Serving
Zinc [as OptiZinc® zinc monomethionine] 20 mg
Copper [as copper bisglycinate chelate] 2 mg
Manganese [as manganese sulfate] 2 mg
Chromium [as chromium nicotinate glycinate chelate] 400 mcg
Molybdenum [as molybdenum glycinate chelate] 250 mcg
Boron [as boron citrate, aspartate, glycinate complex] 3 mg
Vanadyl sulfate [providing 750 mcg vanadium] 3.75 mg
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, stearic acid.
Non-GMO

OptiZinc® is a registered trademark of InterHealth Nutritionals, Inc.
Dosage and Use
  • Take one (1) capsule daily with food, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
Caution
Individuals with in-born errors of copper metabolism (e.g. Wilson’s Disease) should avoid daily, chronic use of this product.
  These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Calcium D-Glucarate Capsules, 200mg, 60ct
Short description:
Calcium D-Glucarate Capsules, 200mg, 60ct Supports Detoxification This formula uses the calcium salt of D-glucarate to support the important process of detoxification.
Your body needs to go through the process of detoxification in order to keep you healthy. A byproduct of the oxidation of glucose, calcium D-glucarate plays an important role in the body’s healthy detoxification process. It helps inhibit enzymes that reverse the detoxification process, helping your body detox the way it should.
Some enzymes work against your body’s detoxification process. This formula helps inhibit that reversal.

Calcium D-Glucarate Benefits

  • Supports the body’s cleaning system
  • Helps maintain already-healthy cholesterol levels
  • Promotes a healthy inflammatory response
  • Provides healthy detoxification support
  • Promotes normal cell division
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description:
Calcium D-Glucarate Capsules, 200mg, 60ct Supports Detoxification This formula uses the calcium salt of D-glucarate to support the important process of detoxification.
Your body needs to go through the process of detoxification in order to keep you healthy. A byproduct of the oxidation of glucose, calcium D-glucarate plays an important role in the body’s healthy detoxification process. It helps inhibit enzymes that reverse the detoxification process, helping your body detox the way it should.
Some enzymes work against your body’s detoxification process. This formula helps inhibit that reversal.

Calcium D-Glucarate Benefits

  • Supports the body’s cleaning system
  • Helps maintain already-healthy cholesterol levels
  • Promotes a healthy inflammatory response
  • Provides healthy detoxification support
  • Promotes normal cell division
D-glucarate can be found naturally in many foods. Fruits like grapefruits, apples and oranges, as well as cruciferous vegetables, contain D-glucarate. Calcium D-glucarate is also made in the body. D-glucarate helps support effective and healthy detoxification. Calcium D-glucarate is the calcium salt of D-glucarate, a compound made in the body through the oxidation of glucose. D-glucarate is also found naturally in grapefruit, apples, oranges and cruciferous vegetables.1,2 D-glucarate can be converted into another compound that helps the body clear steroid hormones and various toxins through a detoxification process called glucuronidation.
This active D-glucarate metabolite works by inhibiting an enzyme that reverses glucuronidation. By supporting effective detoxification, D-glucarate helps maintain optimal hormone levels and promote clearance.1-3 It also encourages a healthy inflammatory response and offers antioxidant protection.4-6 Calcium D-glucarate has been shown to support normal cell division in laboratory studies.7-9 In addition, D-glucarate has been found to help maintain already-healthy levels of cholesterol and other lipids.2

Supplement Facts

Serving Size 1 vegetarian capsule
Amount Per Serving
Calcium (from 200 mg calcium D-glucarate) 24 mg
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), stearic acid, silica.
Non-GMO
Dosage and Use
  • Take one (1) capsule daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.

The word literally means “for the health of the city” and indeed it does keep the beehive clean and protected from bacteria and viruses. It has been found to be a highly useful medicine for fighting infections, boosting the immune system and treating wounds. Propolis is a strong antibacterial, antimicrobial, antifungal, antiviral, and antimicrobial. It is commonly used for sore throats and to stave off illnesses, and can be used topically on cuts, wounds and rashes. It is indicated for bronchitis, pneumonia, and other respiratory infections. Propolis is also used in making salves, tinctures, syrups, and other herbal medicine products. You may also be interested in our Propolis Tincture, our herbal Throat Spray or our herbal Drawing Salve. Sold in 1oz quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Jiaogulan Capsules 100ct
Short description: Jiaogulan Capsules 100ct Gynostemma pentaphyllum 100 veggie capsules Jiaogulan is a powerful adaptogenic herb sourced from the small farming communities in Northern Thailand. With its sweet taste and numerous health benefits, it’s no wonder that Jiaogulan is often referred to as “The Herb of Immortality”. Jiaogulan contains a class of compounds called gypenosides that are responsible for its impressive health benefits. These compounds are structurally similar to the ginsenosides found in Panax ginseng, which is another plant commonly used in traditional medicine. With over 80 gypenosides identified in Jiaogulan, it has more medicinal saponins than Panax ginseng, and is believed to have a variety of beneficial effects on the body. Research suggests that ginsenosides may help improve cardiovascular health, lower blood pressure, reduce the risk of heart disease, and have anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. They have also been studied for their potential to improve cognitive function, enhance immune function, and have anti-cancer effects. Try Jiaogulan today and experience the numerous benefits for yourself! We also offer Jiaogulan Tincture and Bulk Dried Jiaogulan Tea. Please note that these statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration, and this product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Be sure to consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Bone Restore Elite Capsules
Short description:
Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent Vitamin K2 
 
120 Veggie Capsules 
 
 
 
Choose our best-in-class Bone Restore Elite formula for bone health support. It has vitamin K2 as MK-4, clinically studied to support bone density in those that need it most plus calcium, vitamin D3 and trace minerals essential for maintaining strong, healthy bones. 
 
 
 
Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 is a multi-ingredient formula for optimal bone density and mineralization support. It delivers 45 mg (45,000 mcg) of clinically studied vitamin K2 and MK-4, four forms of easily absorbable calcium, vitamin D3 to promote calcium absorption into bone, and zinc, magnesium and other minerals to support and maintain bone health. 
 
 
 
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description:
Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent Vitamin K2 120 Veggie Capsules Choose our best-in-class Bone Restore Elite formula for bone health support. It has vitamin K2 as MK-4, clinically studied to support bone density in those that need it most plus calcium, vitamin D3 and trace minerals essential for maintaining strong, healthy bones. Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 is a multi-ingredient formula for optimal bone density and mineralization support. It delivers 45 mg (45,000 mcg) of clinically studied vitamin K2 and MK-4, four forms of easily absorbable calcium, vitamin D3 to promote calcium absorption into bone, and zinc, magnesium and other minerals to support and maintain bone health.  

Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 Benefits

  • Supports healthy bone mineral density
  • Provides a strong foundation for bone health
  • Promotes healthy calcium absorption
  • Helps support and maintain overall bone health

Vitamin K2 and bone density

Your body has a built-in process for maintaining healthy bone structure, but this process begins to decline over time. In clinical studies, a special form of vitamin K2 called menaquinone-4 (or just MK-4 for short) has been shown to support the biological processes that help maintain bone mineral density in populations that need it most, such as postmenopausal women.

Product Details

Calcium Bone Restore provides a total of 700 mg of four types of easily absorbed calcium: calcium carbonate, calcium citrate malate, calcium bisglycinate chelate, and calcium fructoborate—all delivered in a capsule designed to facilitate calcium breakdown during digestion.
Vitamin D3 Vitamin D is essential for absorbing calcium from the digestive tract into the bloodstream, thus it is vital for helping maintain strong, healthy bones and teeth.1,2 Vitamin K is necessary for healthy bone mineral density Bone loss occurs over time and is a result of an imbalance in the activity of bone cells where there is an increased activity in the bone-dissolving cells called osteoclasts as well as a corresponding decrease in the activity of bone-forming cells, or osteoblasts.3 Vitamin K has been shown to be essential for bone mineralization because it’s a cofactor for the carboxylation of osteocalcin, a protein produced by osteoblasts that is responsible for binding calcium and depositing in the bone. This process is called bone mineralization.4,5 Getting enough vitamin K2 If you’re not getting enough vitamin K2, osteocalcin doesn’t undergo carboxylation and remains in its inactive form, which means it cannot bind to calcium and play its role in bone formation.5 Magnesium Magnesium is needed to maintain strong bones and a healthy vascular system.6 Bone Restore contains 300 mg of magnesium from magnesium oxide. Other bone healthy nutrients Like other formulas in our Bone Restore family, Bone Restore Elite also delivers healthy doses of the trace minerals your bones need: Zinc, manganese and silicon are essential for healthy bone maintenance. Bone maintenance is the healthy balance between bone mineral resorption and remodeling.7-10 You have to have sufficient intake of these elements to support healthy bone formation. Boron is a trace mineral with beneficial effects for bone and joint strength.9,11 This formula contains patented Fruitex B® OsteoBoron®, made from a novel calcium/carbohydrate/boron complex.

Supplement Facts

Serving Size 4 capsules
Servings Per Container 30
Amount Per Serving
Vitamin D3 [as cholecalciferol (1000 IU)] 25 mcg
Vitamin K2 [as menaquinone-4 (45 mg)] 45,000 mcg
Calcium [as carbonate, citrate malate, bisglycinate chelate, fructoborate] 700 mg
Magnesium [as magnesium oxide] 300 mg
Zinc [as zinc amino acid chelate] 2 mg
Manganese [as manganese amino acid chelate] 1 mg
Silicon [from horsetail extract (herb), silicon dioxide]] 5 mg
Boron [as patented Fruitex B® OsteoBoron® calcium fructoborate] 3 mg
Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), stearic acid, maltodextrin, ascorbyl palmitate, silica, rice flour, food starch-modified, citric acid.

Fruitex B® and OsteoBoron® are registered trademarks of VDF Futureceuticals, Inc. Pat. Fcpatent.com

Non-GMO

Dosage and Use
  • Take four (4) capsules daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
  • Scientific studies suggest calcium supplementation in divided doses with food in the morning and evening may yield the best results.
  • Maintaining an optimal vitamin D blood level also helps maximize calcium absorption.
Caution
If you are taking a vitamin K antagonist (e.g. warfarin), consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product.

Name: Mimosa Bark Tincture, 2oz
Short description: Mimosa Bark Tincture, 2oz Albizia julibrissin The silk tree, also known as the mimosa tree, is commonly referred to as ‘happiness tree’ in Traditional Chinese Medicine due to its nervine properties and promotion of positive emotional state. The bark can be used in the form of a tea or tincture and can also be powered to make capsules or external pastes. Mimosa is known for its uplifting qualities and can be supportive in times of immense grief, depression, or despair. Consuming the tincture or tea before bed can soothe the nerves to promote a night of sound sleep. Traditionally it has also been used to support someone processing grief or loss and is often combined with Hawthorn for this purpose. Additionally, this bark is used for general skin irritation and can be incorporated in skin care routines in the form of serums, tinctures, and creams. You may also be interested in Bulk Silk Tree Bark. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Pu'Erh Tea, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description: Pu'Erh Tea, Organic, 1oz bag Camellia sinensis This organic pu-erh tea is hand harvested from wild and semi-wild broad leaf antique tea trees located in the Yunnan province of China. Pu-erh is often referred to as "cooked" due to the fact that sun-dried green tea leaves are transformed from a greenish-golden color to a blackish-red tone. Following the sun-drying period it is fermented for 35-60 days, followed by a 7-10 day cooling period. Over the years pu-erh has garnered a committed following amongst tea connoisseurs who regard it as a sacred relic leftover from ancient tea cultures and traditions. This pu-erh brews up a deep ochre red and has an earthy taste with notes of smoke and moss. It appeals to the senses of both the black tea lover and the green tea lover. Contains caffeine. Sold in 1oz. quantities. If you'd like multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. Brew Instructions Add 1 teaspoon of tea to a cloth tea bag or mesh basket and place in your favorite mug. Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and steep for 3-5 minutes. Experiment with the length of steep time and quantity of tea and find your ideal cup! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Short description:
Apis Mellifica 30c Pills 
 
 
 
A homeopathic remedy indicated for stings or stinging bites (such as ant bites).

Inactive ingredients: Sucrose/lactose pellets. 
 
 
 
Directions: Adults & children: Dissolve 4 pellets under the tongue 3 times a day or as directed by a licensed practitioner. 
 
 
 
4 dram vial size. 900 count of 2.5mm pellets. 
 
 
 
Brand: Washington Homeopathic Products, a very high quality source of Homeopathic Remedies. All source materials for their remedies are selected with great care. Name: Assam T.G.F.O.P. Tea, Organic, 1oz.
Short description: Assam Tea, T.G.F.O.P., Organic, 1oz bag Camellia sinensis Assam tea is one of the most popular varieties of black tea. It makes for a rich dark cup of tea brewed on its own, or pairs wonderfully in blends such a chai or other breakfast blends. Assam tea comes from the Assam region of Northeastern India. It lends itself beautifully to milk and honey, and is also used in our House Chai blend, available by the ounce, or in a 6.75oz bag. CONTAINS CAFFIENE. T.G.F.O.P. stands for Tippy Golden Flowery Orange Pekoe. TGFOP is a tea grade that marks a high proportion of the golden tea bud tips of the tea plant, and indicates a high-quality tea. Origin: India Brew Instructions Fill 1 teaspoon of tea in a cloth tea bag or mesh basket and place in your favorite mug. Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and allow to steep for 3-5 minutes. Experiment with steep time and quantity of tea and find your ideal cup! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and allow to steep for 3-5 minutes. Experiment with steep time and quantity of tea and find your ideal cup! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Description:
Vitamins D and K This formula delivers 125 mcg (5,000 IU) of vitamin D3, 2100 mcg of vitamin K and 1000 mcg of iodine in a convenient, once-daily supplement to support bone, brain, thyroid and vascular health.
Maintaining healthy vitamin D levels helps support cognitive health, promotes bone health, encourages healthy immune function and more. Vitamin K helps maintain your body’s calcium balance, which affects everything from cardiovascular health to bone density. Iodine is essential for the production of thyroid hormones.  

Support your bone, brain, thyroid and arterial health with these three essential nutrients.

Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ Benefits

  • Supports healthy cognitive function
  • Promotes bone, immune & cardiovascular health
  • Helps inhibit calcium buildup in the arteries
  • Helps counteract possible iodine deficiency in healthy diets

What is iodine?

Iodine is a trace element commonly found in seafood. It facilitates the production of thyroid hormones triiodothyronine (T3) and thyroxine (T4).

We’ve combined vitamin D3 with vitamin K and iodine for triple-action health support. Iodine is essential for the production of thyroid hormones. Vitamin K helps maintain your body’s calcium balance. Vitamin D supports cognitive health, healthy bone density, immune health and more. Get all of these vital nutrients in a convenient, once-daily supplement.

Product Details

Your skin produces vitamin D when in direct sunlight, but you should not get your vitamin D from unprotected sun exposure or indoor tanning devices because of the potential effects on skin health.
Iodine is a trace element essential for the production of thyroid hormones, and vitamin K is an essential nutrient that promotes both arterial and bone health. Iodine is essential for thyroid health Iodine is a trace element necessary for the production of the thyroid hormones triiodothyronine (T3) and thyroxine (T4).1 Iodine is abundant in seafood and sea vegetables, but not everyone likes or has access to marine foods, and vegan diets sometimes lack adequate iodine.2 Commercial salt makers add iodine to table salt to make up for this potential deficiency. However, we now know the health risks of eating too much salt, so health-conscious people may miss out on an easy source of iodine. Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ delivers 1,000 mcg of iodine to support healthy iodine levels. Vitamin K1 and two different types of K2 Vitamin K helps inhibit calcium buildup in your arteries while promoting healthy calcium absorption into your bone matrix.3 K1 is the most common form of vitamin K in the diet, coming primarily from leafy green vegetables—though vitamin K1 isn’t well absorbed from these foods. Vitamin K2 is found in cheese, eggs and fermented soybeans. It has been shown to be more bioavailable than K1 and to remain active in the body far longer. The MK-4 and MK-7 forms of vitamin K2 also provide important benefits but have different tissue distributions and bioavailability, so it’s important to take both.4,5 This formula contains both forms of vitamin K2. Vitamin D3 for cognitive, bone and immune health Healthy serum vitamin D levels have been shown to correspond with better cognitive function.6,7 Vitamin D, along with vitamin K and essential minerals, is necessary for facilitating the transport of calcium into the bone matrix for strong, healthy bones and teeth.8 Vitamin D also plays a critical role in healthy immune function.9 Some people may need 125 mcg (5,000 IU) to 200 mcg (8,000 IU) of vitamin D3 a day to achieve healthy blood levels of vitamin D. If your multivitamin already delivers 25-75 mcg (1,000–3,000 IU) of vitamin D, adding Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ may help achieve healthy vitamin D levels. Vitamin D3 for heart health and blood pressure support Vitamin D promotes a healthy inflammatory response, supports cardiovascular health and encourages healthy endothelial function. Vitamin D also helps inhibit excess renin levels. Healthy renin levels help maintain healthy blood pressure already within the normal range.10 Getting enough vitamins D and K and iodine This vitamin D3 supplement delivers 125 mcg (5,000 IU) of vitamin D3 as cholecalciferol per capsule. We suggest that you take a 25-hydroxy vitamin D blood test after 3 months to assess and adjust your dosage. Your optimal blood levels should be 50–80 ng/ml year-round. Ensure you get enough of these three essential nutrients with Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™.

Supplement Facts

Serving Size 1 capsule
Amount Per Serving
Vitamin D3 (as cholecalciferol) 125 mcg
Vitamin K activity from: 2100 mcg
Vitamin K1 (as phytonadione) 1000 mcg
Vitamin K2 (as menaquinone-4) 1000 mcg
Vitamin K2 (as trans menaquinone-7) 100 mcg
Iodine [from Sea-Iodine™ Complex Blend (organic kelp and bladderwrack extracts, potassium iodide)] 1000 mcg
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, food starch-modified, dicalcium phosphate, stearic acid, silica.
Non-GMO  
Dosage and Use
  • Take one (1) capsule once daily with food, or as recomended by a healthcare practitioner.
Caution
Individuals consuming more than 50 mcg (2,000 IU)/day of vitamin D (from diet and supplements) should periodically obtain a serum 25-hydroxy vitamin D measurement. Do not exceed 250 mcg per day unless recommended by your doctor. Vitamin D supplementation is not recommended for individuals with high blood calcium levels. If you have a thyroid condition or are taking antithyroid medications, do not use without consulting your healthcare practitioner. If you are taking a vitamin K antagonist (e.g. warfarin), consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product.
Warnings
  • KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN
  • DO NOT EXCEED RECOMMENDED DOSE
  • Do not purchase if outer seal is broken or damaged.
  • When using nutritional supplements, please consult with your physician if you are undergoing treatment for a medical condition or if you are pregnant or lactating.

Name: Dreams & Visions Tincture 2oz
Short description: A blend of mugwort, blue lotus, damiana, lavender, and blue vervain for restful sleep and vivid dreams. Small-batch crafted with organic cane alcohol.
Description:
The Dreams & Visions Tincture 2oz by Rogue Herbalist is a carefully crafted blend of five revered dream-enhancing herbs: mugwort, blue lotus, damiana, lavender, and blue vervain. Each plant in this formula has a long history in traditional herbalism. They are known for supporting restful sleep, enhancing dream clarity, and inviting a deeper connection to the dream world.

Mugwort is perhaps the most well-known dream herb. It is traditionally used to encourage vivid and sometimes lucid dreams. Blue lotus, prized by ancient cultures, is said to promote relaxation and a sense of gentle euphoria. This makes it a perfect evening ally.

Damiana offers a soothing yet uplifting quality, helping to ease tension before bed. Lavender’s calming aroma and properties have been used for centuries to quiet the mind. Meanwhile, blue vervain supports the release of daily stress, setting the stage for restorative rest.

This formula is extracted in 47.5% organic cane alcohol to ensure potency and stability. It is blended with ROM maple water and organic glycerine for a smooth and balanced taste. Every batch is made in small quantities to maintain freshness and quality.

To enjoy, take 30 drops (1ml) in a small amount of water or directly under the tongue about an hour before bed. Many find this tincture especially useful for dream journaling practices. It is also beneficial for meditation before sleep or simply enhancing the quality of rest.

For a broader nighttime wellness approach, consider pairing the Dreams & Visions Tincture with our Sleep Formula Tincture for deep relaxation. If mental clarity upon waking is important, explore our Lion’s Mane Mushroom Extract or Brain Mushroom Support for daytime cognitive support.

Name: Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula Capsules
Short description: Gentle, herbal support for healthy bowel movements and digestive regularity. A classic formula by Dr. Christopher for lower bowel function.
Description:
Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula gently supports healthy digestion and regular bowel movements. This herbal blend combines cascara sagrada bark, barberry root, ginger, lobelia, and other traditional herbs. Together, they provide natural cleansing and digestive support.

For centuries, people have used cascara sagrada as a mild laxative. It stimulates the colon and encourages regularity without harsh cramping or dependency. In addition, barberry and ginger soothe the digestive tract and promote healthy digestion. Lobelia helps relax smooth muscles gently. Therefore, these herbs work together to encourage natural elimination and digestive comfort.

This formula suits those with occasional constipation or sluggish digestion. Unlike harsh stimulant laxatives, Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula works in harmony with the body. You can use it short-term for relief or as part of a regular wellness routine to maintain gut health.

Dr. John R. Christopher created this formula to honor the body’s natural rhythms. He aimed to support long-term digestive wellness. Each batch retains the potency and purity of these time-tested herbs.

Suggested Use: Take two capsules daily with water. Preferably, take before bedtime or follow your healthcare professional’s advice. Avoid use during pregnancy or if allergic to any ingredient.

In summary, Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula helps maintain digestive balance. It promotes gentle and natural elimination.

If you're looking for other amazing digestive products, check out our Hemp Bitters, Digestive Bitters, and our Heal The Gut tea blend.

Name: Digestive Bitters Formula - 2 oz
Short description: A traditional herbal formula designed to stimulate digestive secretions and support healthy digestion. Made with organic bitters including gentian, dandelion, and citrus peel.
Description:
Activate your digestion with this traditional digestive bitters formula. It's made from a potent blend of roots, seeds, leaves, and citrus peels. Bitters have long been used to support healthy digestion. They stimulate stomach acid, bile, and digestive enzyme production—essential for breaking down food and absorbing nutrients.

This handcrafted Digestive Bitters Formula includes gentian, artichoke leaf, dandelion, fennel, ginger, and other time-tested herbs. These help prepare the body for meals. Whether you're dealing with sluggish digestion, occasional bloating, or simply want to support long-term gut health, Digestive Bitters can make a powerful difference.

Take Digestive Bitters before meals to:

  • Stimulate digestive secretions

  • Support liver and gallbladder function

  • Reduce occasional gas and bloating

  • Promote better nutrient absorption

  • Encourage a mindful eating ritual

In addition to digestive benefits, many of the herbs in this blend—such as yellowdock, dandelion, and oregon grape root—have traditionally been used to support liver detoxification, healthy blood function, and balanced blood sugar levels.

By promoting bile flow and supporting the liver’s natural cleansing role, bitters can help your body eliminate metabolic waste more effectively. Also, some bitter herbs assist with regulating post-meal blood sugar spikes. This makes it a helpful formula for overall metabolic health.

Digestive Bitters Formula are extracted using organic cane alcohol and ROM distilled maple water to preserve the full spectrum of active plant compounds.

Digestive Bitters Formula Ingredients:
Angelica Root, Artichoke Leaf, Gentian Root, Dandelion Root, Dandelion Leaf, Grapefruit Peel, Orange Peel, Lemon Peel, Oregon Grape Root, Fennel Seed, Anise Seed, Ginger, Yellowdock.
Other Ingredients: Organic Cane Alcohol (47.5%)

Suggested Use:
Take 30 drops (about 1 dropperful) in 1 oz of water, 10–15 minutes before meals. Digestive Bitters work best when tasted—embrace the flavor!

Caution:
Not for use during pregnancy. Consult your healthcare provider before use if nursing or taking medications. Not intended for children.

Name: Buhner’s Blessings – Tick-Borne Support Protocol (4 oz Tincture)
Short description: A foundational herbal formula inspired by Stephen Harrod Buhner’s protocol, featuring five powerful herbs to support immune function and microbial balance during tick-borne challenges.
Description:
Buhner’s Blessings – Tick-Borne Support Protocol (4 oz Tincture)

This formula is a foundational herbal protocol designed to support individuals dealing with the complex terrain of tick-borne challenges. This includes exposure to Borrelia species. Inspired by the renowned work of clinical herbalist Stephen Harrod Buhner, this blend features five well-regarded herbs. These are traditionally used to promote immune resilience, support systemic health, and maintain balance in the face of microbial stress.

At the heart of this formula is Andrographis paniculata, known for its wide-reaching immune-modulating effects. Japanese Knotweed Root provides cardiovascular, neurological, and cytokine pathway support, while Cat’s Claw Bark helps promote healthy immune surveillance. Houttuynia cordata, a lesser-known but powerful plant ally, supports microbial balance and mucosal health. Sarsaparilla Root rounds out the blend, traditionally used to assist detoxification and inflammatory regulation.

Each 1 mL serving delivers a potent 1:2 extract in organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water

Ingredients (per serving):
Andrographis Leaf, Japanese Knotweed Root, Cat's Claw Bark, Houttuynia Whole Plant, Sarsaparilla Root.
Other Ingredients: Organic Cane Alcohol (55%), Reverse Osmosis Maple Water.
Herb Strength Ratio: 1:2
Serving Size: 30 drops (1 mL)
Servings Per Container: 120

Suggested Use:
Take 30 drops (1 mL) in water, 2–3 times daily or as directed by your qualified herbalist or healthcare practitioner. For best results, use consistently over time. Include it as part of a broader wellness strategy.

Caution:
Not for use during pregnancy. Consult your healthcare provider before use if nursing, taking medications, or managing a chronic condition. Not intended for children.

Name: Gentian Root Tincture - 2 oz
Short description: A pure bitter, Gentian root is used for stimulating digestion and awakening appetite. Made with Organic Gentian Root.
Description:
Get your digestion moving naturally with our Gentian Root Tincture – 2 oz. Gentian (Gentiana lutea) is one of the most well-known “pure bitters,” prized for centuries as a digestive aid. This classic bitter root is famous for its role in Angostura Bitters and other traditional cocktail recipes, but its true power lies in herbal wellness.

Gentian Root is considered a true digestive bitter, helping stimulate the body’s natural digestive secretions. Traditionally, it has been used to support sluggish liver function, encourage appetite, and ease common digestive discomforts. Many herbalists recommend gentian for symptoms such as gas, bloating, cramping, nausea, vomiting, and occasional heartburn. Its stimulating, cooling qualities also make it valuable in cases of sluggish digestion or when food feels heavy after meals.

In herbal traditions, Gentian Root is classified as a hepatic, cholagogue, choleretic, emmenagogue, mild sialogogue, febrifuge, anthelmintic, antimicrobial, and hypoglycemic. This wide spectrum of actions highlights its versatility as a tonic herb, especially for those seeking to strengthen overall digestive and liver health. Some traditions also note gentian’s usefulness in easing allergy symptoms due to its influence on gut-liver balance.

Gentian is also a key ingredient in our Digestive Bitters Formula, an excellent companion if you’re seeking a complete bitters blend.

Ingredients: Organically Grown Dried Gentian Roots, 47.5% Organic Cane Alcohol, ROM Maple Water.

Do not use gentian during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Always consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing new herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Sweet Cinnamon Tincture 2oz
Short description: Warm, aromatic, and crafted from organic Cinnamomum verum bark, our Sweet Cinnamon Tincture supports digestion, circulation, and comfort—made in small batches with cane alcohol and maple water.
Description:
Our Sweet Cinnamon Tincture is a vibrant, aromatic herbal extract crafted from Cinnamomum verum—the true cinnamon cherished for centuries for its comforting flavor and wellness benefits. Carefully prepared in small batches, we combine organically cultivated dry bark chips with 70% cane alcohol and pure maple water drawn from our region, creating a potent, flavorful extract that captures the plant’s warming essence.

Cinnamon has long been valued in both traditional herbalism and culinary arts for its ability to warm the body, support healthy digestion, and promote overall vitality. Its naturally sweet, spicy aroma makes it a pleasure to take, while its properties have been traditionally used to help balance blood sugar, soothe occasional digestive discomfort, and invigorate circulation.

Each serving of our Sweet Cinnamon Tincture contains the concentrated energy of the bark, extracted at peak freshness to ensure maximum potency. We use a herb-to-liquid ratio that delivers both flavor and efficacy, making this tincture a perfect companion for your daily wellness routine. Simply add 30 drops (about 1 ml) to a small amount of water, tea, or juice, and enjoy its naturally uplifting taste.

Our process honors the integrity of the herb—sourcing organic Cinnamomum verum, using sustainable harvesting practices, and crafting the tincture without unnecessary additives. The result is a pure, clean extract that reflects both the healing traditions of herbalism and the care of artisanal preparation.

Whether you enjoy cinnamon for its flavor or its supportive qualities, our Sweet Cinnamon Tincture offers a simple, effective way to integrate this beloved spice into your life. Warm your senses, support your digestion, and connect with the wisdom of plant medicine—one drop at a time.

We also feature Sweet Cinnamon in our Blood Sugar Tea!

Name: Flax Seed Oil 3000mg – Olympian Labs Cold Pressed Lignan Softgels (90 count)
Short description: Cold pressed and rich in lignans, Flax Seed Oil 3000mg by Olympian Labs delivers plant-based omega-3s for heart, joint, and skin health—90 softgels per bottle.
Description:
Our Flax Seed Oil 3000mg by Olympian Labs is a premium-quality, cold-pressed supplement that delivers a rich source of essential fatty acids to support your overall wellness. Made from 100% pure, high-lignan flax seed oil, each serving provides a concentrated dose of alpha-linolenic acid (ALA), a plant-based omega-3 fatty acid known for promoting heart health, joint comfort, and skin vitality.

Flax seed oil is one of nature’s most versatile nutritional oils. The ALA in this formula helps maintain a healthy balance of inflammatory responses in the body, supports normal cholesterol levels, and may contribute to improved cognitive function. Additionally, the lignans naturally present in flax seeds are plant compounds with antioxidant properties, offering extra support for immune health and cellular protection.

Each serving of Flax Seed Oil 3000mg provides 1,500mg of alpha-linolenic acid, 330mg of linoleic acid (omega-6), and 330mg of oleic acid (omega-9), along with palmitic and stearic acids for a complete fatty acid profile. This nutrient blend works synergistically to promote cardiovascular wellness, nourish the skin, and keep your joints flexible.

Olympian Labs ensures that their flax seed oil is cold-pressed to preserve nutrient integrity, and packaged in softgels for easy swallowing and optimal absorption. This makes it a convenient choice for anyone looking to add more plant-based omega-3s to their diet—whether you follow a vegetarian lifestyle or simply want a clean, high-quality supplement.

Suggested use: Take three softgels daily with meals for best results.

Name: Rock Rose Loose Herb – Cistus incanus – 2 oz
Short description: Rock rose (Cistus incanus) loose herb tea supports immune health, disrupts biofilms, and may help with various infections including tick infections and co-infections.
Description:
Rock rose (Cistus incanus) is a remarkable Mediterranean herb valued for centuries in herbal traditions. This loose herb is ideal for brewing a fragrant, earthy tea with a wide range of potential benefits.

  • One of the most notable qualities of Rock rose Cistus incanus is its potential role in supporting the body during various infections. It has been suggested to offer benefits against viral, bacterial, and fungal challenges. Many practitioners consider it an “intelligent” biofilm buster that disrupts the protective barriers. These barriers are what bacteria use to evade conventional antibiotics. This property makes it of special interest in protocols addressing persistent infections.
  • Dr. Dietrich Klinghardt has highlighted the use of Rock rose Cistus incanus tea in his Biological Lyme Protocol. He notes its potential effectiveness against Borrelia burgdorferi (the Lyme disease pathogen) and co-infections such as Bartonella. Studies have also explored its antiviral effects. These show activity against influenza, rhinoviruses, HIV, Ebola, and Marburg viruses, possibly by preventing viruses from attaching to host cells.
  • Research also indicates antibacterial potential. It is especially effective against Gram-positive bacteria like Streptococcus mutans, helping reduce bacterial adhesion in the mouth. This supports oral health. Its antioxidant potential is exceptionally high, potentially exceeding that of green tea and red wine. Thus, it contributes to immune support and healthy inflammatory balance.

Additionally, the polyphenols in Rock rose Cistus incanus may help bind heavy metals, assisting the body’s detoxification processes. This makes it a valuable part of a seasonal wellness routine.

To prepare, steep 1–2 teaspoons of the loose herb in freshly boiled water for 10–15 minutes. Enjoy warm, up to three times daily, or as recommended by your practitioner.

You may also enjoy pairing Rock rose Cistus incanus with Olive Leaf Extract, Elderberry Syrup, or Buhner's Blessings Tick Borne Infection Support for a more complete immune-supporting protocol.

Mitochondria are often called the “powerhouses of the cell,” and maintaining their function is vital for sustained energy, healthy aging, and optimal performance.

PQQ works as a cofactor in enzymatic reactions and supports the creation of new mitochondria, a process known as mitochondrial biogenesis. By assisting in this renewal, PQQ may help cells work more efficiently, improve energy metabolism, and protect against oxidative stress. Many users turn to PQQ for sustained vitality, sharper mental focus, and healthier aging.

Each capsule is formulated with pure pyrroloquinoline quinone disodium salt and produced with Life Extension’s quality standards. PQQ by Life Extension is a trusted choice for those seeking long-term support for energy and vitality.

Name: Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony
Short description: Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony delivers 10mg of 99.9% USP Grade methylene blue per serving, blended with nano gold, ORMUS minerals, structured water, and organic glycerin.
Description:
Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony

This is a premium liquid supplement. It is created for those seeking advanced support for balance, energy, and overall vitality. Crafted with precision, this formula brings together the highest quality Methylene Blue USP Grade (99.9%). Additionally, it includes nano liquid gold, ORMUS supercharged minerals, organic vegetable glycerin, and triple distilled biophotonic structured water.

Methylene blue is a long-established compound. It was first synthesized in the 19th century and historically used as a dye and in treating malaria. Today, it holds FDA-approval for treating methemoglobinemia. This is a rare condition where red blood cells struggle to release oxygen effectively.

Beyond this, early research—particularly in animal studies and small human trials—suggests that low-dose methylene blue may support mitochondrial function. It does this by enhancing cellular energy (ATP) production and reducing oxidative stress. It is also being explored for its potential neuroprotective and cognitive-supportive properties. These applications are in conditions like Alzheimer’s.

However, experts caution that current evidence remains limited. Combining methylene blue with certain medications—especially antidepressants—can pose significant risks, including serotonin syndrome.

Each serving of 1ml (20 drops) contains 10mg of pure methylene blue. This is measured for consistency and purity. This ingredient has been widely studied in scientific research and is now gaining renewed interest in modern wellness communities. By combining methylene blue with nano liquid gold and ORMUS minerals, Earth Harmony has created a synergistic blend. It reflects both advanced science and traditional mineral practices.

The liquid base is made with triple distilled, biophotonic structured water, ensuring clarity and energetic stability. Organic vegetable glycerin provides smooth taste, easy dosing, and efficient absorption, while keeping the formula clean and formaldehyde-free.

As with all concentrated formulas, we recommend discussing use with your healthcare provider. Do not use if you are currently taking psychiatric medications, including treatments for anxiety, depression, or serotonin modulation. Responsible and informed use is key to getting the most out of this product.

Preliminary clinical and in vitro research suggests that grapefruit seed extract supports gastrointestinal comfort, microbial balance, and immune health.*

Grapefruit Seed Extract Is Recommended For:*

  • Gut health and gastrointestinal comfort
  • Microbial and fungal balance
  • Immune system support
  • Antioxidant protection

Name: Zincberry Shield

Description:
Doctor Strength – Zincberry Shield

Immune Support Lozenges with Zinc, Elderberry & Vitamin D3* Defend your immune system year-round with the synergistic power of zinc, elderberry, and vitamin D3. Doctor Strength’s Zincberry Shield delivers targeted support for the throat, sinuses, and upper respiratory tract—all in a convenient, great-tasting lozenge.*

The Science Behind Zincberry Shield

  • Zinc (as Citrate & Gluconate): An essential trace mineral that helps immune cells function at their best. Zinc supports healthy lung function, clear skin, and overall vitality.*
  • Elderberry (Sambucus nigra): Used for centuries in traditional herbalism and supported by modern research, elderberry provides powerful antioxidant compounds (polyphenols) that promote upper respiratory and sinus health.*
  • Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol): Known as the “sunshine vitamin,” vitamin D3 is critical for immune balance. It activates macrophages and T-cells, helping the body stay resilient while also supporting bone and cardiovascular health.* 
Unlike many zinc and elderberry lozenges on the market that contain added sugars, Zincberry Shield is naturally sweetened with xylitol, stevia, and honey powder. This makes it a smart choice for daily immune support without compromising taste or wellness.
